translated: That which produces the sprout is the nature of the seed that produces the sprout.

original: 'bras bu mthong bas dpag pa'i ngo bo nyid de skyed pa'i rang bzhin yin pas so //
analyzed: 'bras bu mthong bas dpag pa'i ngo bo nyid de skyed pa'i rang bzhin yin pas so //
translated: The nature of the seed that is inferred from seeing the result is the nature of the producer of the sprout.

original: gal te de lta na de kho na myu gu skyed pa'i rang bzhin yin la sngar byung ba'i gnas skabs ni de skyed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ji ltar de rnams la de'i rgyur bshad /
analyzed: gal te de lta na de kho na myu gu skyed pa'i rang bzhin yin la sngar byung ba'i gnas skabs ni de skyed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ji ltar de rnams la de'i rgyur bshad /
translated: But if that is so, since the seed is the nature that generates the sprout, then how could it be explained as the cause of those that exist earlier, since the state that existed earlier is not the nature that generates it?

original: myu gu don du gnyer ba rnams kyis de nye bar len to zhe na /
analyzed: myu gu don du gnyer ba rnams kyis de nye bar len to zhe na /
translated: Those who seek the sprout take up the seed as its cause.

original: sngon gyi gnas skabs zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: sngon gyi gnas skabs zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The state that existed earlier

original: sbyang la sogs pa na gnas pa'i dus su yod pa'i gnas skabs dang khyad par med pa'i myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyu tha ma'i gnas skabs dang khyad par med pa'i rgyu ni rkyen gzhan la rag las pa'i khyad par gyis yin no //
analyzed: sbyang la sogs pa na gnas pa'i dus su yod pa'i gnas skabs dang khyad par med pa'i myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyu tha ma'i gnas skabs dang khyad par med pa'i rgyu ni rkyen gzhan la rag las pa'i khyad par gyis yin no //
translated: The cause of the sprout, etc. is not different from the state that existed earlier, when it existed in the state of being a seed, etc. and the cause is not different from the state that is the final cause of the sprout, etc. but it is distinguished by its dependence on other conditions.

original: brgyud pas skye ba de'i phyir de rnams ni btags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brgyud pas skye ba de'i phyir de rnams ni btags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since it arises indirectly, it is designated as the cause of those.

original: myu gu don du gnyer ba rnams kyis rgyur brjod pa nye bar len to //
analyzed: myu gu don du gnyer ba rnams kyis rgyur brjod pa nye bar len to //
translated: Those who seek the sprout take up the seed as its cause.

original: gang gi phyir sa bon la sogs pa de'i ngo bo rgyu gzhan la ltos pa ni skyed par byed pa de la ltos pa'i phyir de'i de skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sa bon la sogs pa de'i ngo bo rgyu gzhan la ltos pa ni skyed par byed pa de la ltos pa'i phyir de'i de skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: Because the seed, etc., which is that nature, is dependent on another cause, it is said that it is generated in dependence on that, and that it has the nature of being generated.

original: de'i phyir sa bon la sogs pa dang ldan pas ma nges pa ma yin te de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya bas gtan tshigs kyi mjug bsdu ba yin no //üîΩde lta na de ni gang gi tshe re zhig ngo shes pa mngon sum gyi tshad ma rtag pa grub bar @235b gzhan dag brjod pas sa bon la sogs pa dang ldan pas ma nges par bstan pa de'i tshe sngar bshad pa'i rnam pas mngon sum dang rjes
analyzed: de'i phyir sa bon la sogs pa dang ldan pas ma nges pa ma yin te de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya bas gtan tshigs kyi mjug bsdu ba yin no // de lta na de ni gang gi tshe re zhig ngo shes pa mngon sum gyi tshad ma rtag pa grub bar @235b gzhan dag brjod pas sa bon la sogs pa dang ldan pas ma nges par bstan pa de'i tshe sngar bshad pa'i rnam pas mngon sum dang rjes
translated: Therefore, it is not indefinite because of possessing the seed, etc., because it has that nature. This is the conclusion of the argument.

original: su dpag pa dag gis gnod pa'i phyir de'i bdag nyid med pa yin na gang gis na de las gcig pa nyid du yod pa yin /
analyzed: su dpag pa dag gis gnod pa'i phyir de'i bdag nyid med pa yin na gang gis na de las gcig pa nyid du yod pa yin /
translated: Thus, when others say that recognition is a valid cognition of permanence, and that it is established, then it is shown to be indefinite because of possessing the seed, etc. At that time, because it is harmed by direct perception and inference, as previously explained, it does not have that nature. By what is it existent as the same as that?

original: gang gi phyir ma nges par 'gyur zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir ma nges par 'gyur zhes bstan zin to //
translated: Because of what would it be indefinite? This has already been explained.

original: gang gi tshe ngo shes pa yin pa'i phyir sa bon la sogs pa snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus dag rang bzhin gcig pa yin no zhes gtan tshigs su gzhan dag brjod na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe ngo shes pa yin pa'i phyir sa bon la sogs pa snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus dag rang bzhin gcig pa yin no zhes gtan tshigs su gzhan dag brjod na /
translated: If others say that the seed and so on at the prior and later times are of the same nature because they are recognized,

original: de ni 'dir gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin te la lar dngos su yod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'dir gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin te la lar dngos su yod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: then that reason is unestablished for us, because it is not directly perceived.

original: 'dir skad cig ma'i dngos po rnams la gcig pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro shes kho bo cag 'dod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'dir skad cig ma'i dngos po rnams la gcig pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro shes kho bo cag 'dod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: We accept that things that are momentary are not the same.

original: 'on te gang mang skad cig ma'i dngos po de yang sa bon la sogs pa'i skad cig ma re re'i gcig pa'i ngo bo bye brag kyang mi rtogs pa'i phyir skad cig ma tha ma bzhin du thams cad kyang skyed bar byed pa'i rang bzhin yin te /
analyzed: 'on te gang mang skad cig ma'i dngos po de yang sa bon la sogs pa'i skad cig ma re re'i gcig pa'i ngo bo bye brag kyang mi rtogs pa'i phyir skad cig ma tha ma bzhin du thams cad kyang skyed bar byed pa'i rang bzhin yin te /
translated: But if you say that the many things that are momentary are the same in the sense that each moment of the seed and so on has the same nature, then, because the difference between them is not perceived, all of them would generate sprouts, just as the final moment does.

original: de'i ngo bo ni chu la sogs pa la ltos pa'i phyir de'i gnas skabs kyi ma nges pa yin no zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo ni chu la sogs pa la ltos pa'i phyir de'i gnas skabs kyi ma nges pa yin no zhes dogs pa la /
translated: Because their nature depends on water and so on, their state is uncertain.

original: gzhan dang gzhan skye bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gzhan dang gzhan skye bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúFrom other and other arising,‚Äù etc.

original: skad cig ma la ma nges pa med do //
analyzed: skad cig ma la ma nges pa med do //
translated: There is no uncertainty about the moment.

original: rkyen gzhan dang gzhan las skad cig ma so sor skye bas skad cig ma rnams tha dad pas nus pa'i phyir skad cig ma tha ma bzhin du skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin spangs nas de yang gang gis na ma nges pa yin /
analyzed: rkyen gzhan dang gzhan las skad cig ma so sor skye bas skad cig ma rnams tha dad pas nus pa'i phyir skad cig ma tha ma bzhin du skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin spangs nas de yang gang gis na ma nges pa yin /
translated: Since each moment arises from other and other conditions, the moments are different. Therefore, since they are capable, like the final moment, what is the nature that produces them, from which they are uncertain?

original: rgyu tha dad pa la rag las pa'i skye ba rnams ni bye brag nye bar rtogs su zin kyang tha mi dad par mi rigs so //
analyzed: rgyu tha dad pa la rag las pa'i skye ba rnams ni bye brag nye bar rtogs su zin kyang tha mi dad par mi rigs so //
translated: Arisings that depend on different causes, even if one observes a particular, are not reasonable as undifferentiated.

original: rgyu tha dad pa'i rjes su mi byed na rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu tha dad pa'i rjes su mi byed na rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If they do not follow different causes, it follows they are causeless.

original: de skad du yang 'du byed pa'i rgyun las gzhan dang gzhan pa'i rkyen dang ldan pas skad cig ma re re la nus pa tha dad pa can dag 'ga' zhig mtshungs pas ngo bo 'dra bar shes mod kyi de lta na de dag gi ngo bo tha dad
analyzed: de skad du yang 'du byed pa'i rgyun las gzhan dang gzhan pa'i rkyen dang ldan pas skad cig ma re re la nus pa tha dad pa can dag 'ga' zhig mtshungs pas ngo bo 'dra bar shes mod kyi de lta na de dag gi ngo bo tha dad
translated: Thus, from the continuum of the compounded, since it possesses other and other conditions, each moment has a different capacity. Some are similar in nature, but even so, their nature is different.

original: pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: pa kho na yin te /
translated: It is only the latter.üîΩüîΩ

original: des na 'ga' zhig gi rgyu yin zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: des na 'ga' zhig gi rgyu yin zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúIt is the cause of some.‚ÄùüîΩIn response to the statement, ‚ÄúBecause it generates its entity,‚Äù and so on,

original: ji skad du de'i ngo bo nyid bskyed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gzhan dag ma nges pa brjod pa ni de zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ji skad du de'i ngo bo nyid bskyed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gzhan dag ma nges pa brjod pa ni de zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: others say, ‚ÄúIt is not definite,‚Äù and they state, ‚ÄúThat‚Äù

original: sa bon dang zhing la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sa bon dang zhing la sogs pa'o //
translated: means seeds, fields, and so on.üîΩThe final state is the final entity that is able to generate the sprout.

original: mtha' ma ni tha ma'i dngos po so sor myu gu skyed par nus pa rgyu rnams gyes nas 'bras bu skyed par med par khyed rnams 'dod pa yin yang ci'i phyir re re skyed par mi byed /
analyzed: mtha' ma ni tha ma'i dngos po so sor myu gu skyed par nus pa rgyu rnams gyes nas 'bras bu skyed par med par khyed rnams 'dod pa yin yang ci'i phyir re re skyed par mi byed /
translated: Even though you assert that the result is generated after the causes have separated, why does each not generate the sprout?

original: des na 'di @236a * //
analyzed: des na 'di @236a * //
translated: Therefore,üîΩif each of these is able to generate the sprout, then even if the others were to possess the entity of that, they would not generate it.

original: rnams kyi re re nyid 'ga' zhig las myu gu skye bar 'gyur gyi do dag gzhan de'i ngo bo yin du zin kyang mi skyed pa yin na ni de'i ngo bo skyed pa yin no zhes bya ba ma nges pa yin pas de bzhin du sbyar ba la
analyzed: rnams kyi re re nyid 'ga' zhig las myu gu skye bar 'gyur gyi do dag gzhan de'i ngo bo yin du zin kyang mi skyed pa yin na ni de'i ngo bo skyed pa yin no zhes bya ba ma nges pa yin pas de bzhin du sbyar ba la
translated: If that were so, it would be indefinite to say, ‚ÄúIt generates the entity of that,‚Äù and thus it would be applied in the same way.

original: sogs pa na gnas ba sa bon la sogs pa yang myu gu la sogs pa skyed pa'i rang bzhin yin du zin kyang mi skyed par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sogs pa na gnas ba sa bon la sogs pa yang myu gu la sogs pa skyed pa'i rang bzhin yin du zin kyang mi skyed par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and so on means that even though the seed and so on are by nature productive of the sprout and so on, they are not productive.

original: de ma nges pa yin pas de'i gnas skabs kho na yin no zhes gzhan dag sems pa na /
analyzed: de ma nges pa yin pas de'i gnas skabs kho na yin no zhes gzhan dag sems pa na /
translated: Since that is not certain, others think that it is just in that situation.

original: 'dir mi byed ce na zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'dir mi byed ce na zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Here, if you say that it does not act,

original: de ltar gal te gzhan gyis bsam pas spyi'i sgro nas brjod pa spyi yis lan btab pa ni skyed par byed pa kho na'o zhes bya ba smos pa ste 'dir rang gi 'bras bu skyed pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar gal te gzhan gyis bsam pas spyi'i sgro nas brjod pa spyi yis lan btab pa ni skyed par byed pa kho na'o zhes bya ba smos pa ste 'dir rang gi 'bras bu skyed pa'o //
translated: then, in that case, if you reply in general by means of a general statement, it is said that it is only productive, that is, it produces its own effect here.

original: de lta ma yin na dngos po skyed par byed pa ma yin par dogs so //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na dngos po skyed par byed pa ma yin par dogs so //
translated: Otherwise, it would be doubted that the thing is not productive.

original: gang las she na /
analyzed: gang las she na /
translated: From what?

original: ngo bo nyid ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because its intrinsic reality cannot be reversed.

original: gal te skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin na skyed par byed par mi 'gyur te de'i rang bzhin du 'dod na ni gdon mi za ba skyed pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin na skyed par byed par mi 'gyur te de'i rang bzhin du 'dod na ni gdon mi za ba skyed pa yin no //
translated: If it is not productive by nature, it will not be productive. If it is asserted to be its nature, then it is certainly productive.

original: de lta na yang gang las ma nges pa'i dngos por 'gyur /
analyzed: de lta na yang gang las ma nges pa'i dngos por 'gyur /
translated: But how can it be uncertain from what they arise?

original: mtha' ma'i skyed par byed pa gcig yod pas 'bras bu gcig pa nyid skyed pa yin gyi gzhan dag ni nye bar sbyor ba'i yul med pa'i phyir skyed par byed pa ma yin no snyam du gzhan dag sems pas gal te de lta na lhan cig byed pa
analyzed: mtha' ma'i skyed par byed pa gcig yod pas 'bras bu gcig pa nyid skyed pa yin gyi gzhan dag ni nye bar sbyor ba'i yul med pa'i phyir skyed par byed pa ma yin no snyam du gzhan dag sems pas gal te de lta na lhan cig byed pa
translated: Since there is one final producer, it produces the same effect, but the others are not producers because they do not have the object to which they are applied.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: If you think this, then the verse says,üîΩ‚ÄúThe simultaneous‚Äù

original: lhan cig pa ni cig car ba'i rgyur rung ba rnams so //
analyzed: lhan cig pa ni cig car ba'i rgyur rung ba rnams so //
translated: Simultaneous means suitable as a cause.

original: de'i 'bras bu byed pa'i rung bas khas blangs pa'i yod pa'i 'bras bu la gcig kho nas bskyed pa'i phyir gzhan gyi nye bar sbyor bar ci zhig dgos te ci yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu byed pa'i rung bas khas blangs pa'i yod pa'i 'bras bu la gcig kho nas bskyed pa'i phyir gzhan gyi nye bar sbyor bar ci zhig dgos te ci yang ma yin no //
translated: Since the effect that is suitable to be produced by that is produced by only one of them, what is the use of the application of the others? It is useless.

original: de skyed par byed pa kho na'o zhes bya ba ci zhig brjod ce na /
analyzed: de skyed par byed pa kho na'o zhes bya ba ci zhig brjod ce na /
translated: What do you say about the one that produces it?

original: 'di'i lan ni dngos po rnams zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di'i lan ni dngos po rnams zhes bya'o //
translated: The response to that is ‚ÄúThings.‚Äù

original: dngos po rnams ni sa bon la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po rnams ni sa bon la sogs pa'o //
translated: Things are seeds and so on.

original: rtog pa sngon du gtong par byed cing blo sngon du gtong bar byed pa ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: rtog pa sngon du gtong par byed cing blo sngon du gtong bar byed pa ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: There is no one who would ever engage in conceptualization and mental activity.

original: gang gi phyir rtog pa sngon du gtong par byed pas 'di kho bo cag gang yang rung ba gcig pus kyang 'bras bu skyed par nus na bdag cag gis ci zhig bya zhes brtags nas gzhan dag ldog par 'gyur zhing btang snyoms su 'dug pa la brten pa
analyzed: gang gi phyir rtog pa sngon du gtong par byed pas 'di kho bo cag gang yang rung ba gcig pus kyang 'bras bu skyed par nus na bdag cag gis ci zhig bya zhes brtags nas gzhan dag ldog par 'gyur zhing btang snyoms su 'dug pa la brten pa
translated: Because, having engaged in conceptualization, they would think, ‚ÄúIf one of us is able to produce the effect, what need is there for us all? ‚Äù and then they would cease to exist and would rely on indifference.

original: na de'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa na'o //
analyzed: na de'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa na'o //
translated: When it produces its effect.

original: gang gi phyir sa bon la sogs pa'i dngos po de ni sems ba med pa'i byed pa can no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sa bon la sogs pa'i dngos po de ni sems ba med pa'i byed pa can no //
translated: Because that thing, such as the seed, is an inactive entity.

original: dpyad na stong pa'i byed pa ni gcig gis skyed pa na gcig gi 'bras bu la thams cad byed pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: dpyad na stong pa'i byed pa ni gcig gis skyed pa na gcig gi 'bras bu la thams cad byed pa kho na yin no //
translated: When one of them produces the effect, all of them are active with regard to the effect of the one.

original: @236b dngos po chos can gyi 'bras bu de dag sngar yod pa'i byed pa las de bzhin na mi rigs so //
analyzed: @236b dngos po chos can gyi 'bras bu de dag sngar yod pa'i byed pa las de bzhin na mi rigs so //
translated: If the effect of the entity were to exist previously, it would not be tenable that it is produced by the activity of those.

original: gang gi tshe byed pa can de las gzhan pa'i byed pa yin pa de'i tshe de nyid las 'bras bu skyed pa'i byed ba dang ldan pas byed pa po nyid dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe byed pa can de las gzhan pa'i byed pa yin pa de'i tshe de nyid las 'bras bu skyed pa'i byed ba dang ldan pas byed pa po nyid dor bar bya'o //
translated: But when the agent is different from the action, then it is the agent because it possesses the action that produces the effect.

original: gal te de 'di'i byed ba ni byed ba po de las de yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de 'di'i byed ba ni byed ba po de las de yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the action of this agent is that action,

original: 'o na ni de ltar byed pa po ni nye bar mkho ba yin gyi /
analyzed: 'o na ni de ltar byed pa po ni nye bar mkho ba yin gyi /
translated: then the agent is required for the action,

original: 'bras bu la nye bar mi mkho ba ni de la btags pa yin pas don dam bar na byed pa po dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu la nye bar mi mkho ba ni de la btags pa yin pas don dam bar na byed pa po dor bar bya'o //
translated: but the effect is not required for the agent. Therefore, the agent is rejected in the ultimate sense.

original: byed pa 'di dang su zhig 'brel pa yin 'du ba yin na ni sngar bsal zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa 'di dang su zhig 'brel pa yin 'du ba yin na ni sngar bsal zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: With what is this action related? If it is related by inherence, that has already been refuted.

original: 'du ba yang byed pa dang ldan pa yin na /
analyzed: 'du ba yang byed pa dang ldan pa yin na /
translated: If inherence is related to the agent,

original: gzhan yang de'i 'bras bu la nye bar mi mkho ba de yod par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang de'i 'bras bu la nye bar mi mkho ba de yod par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then it follows that it exists even though it is not required for the effect.

original: 'du ba 'di'i blo'i rgyu yin no snyam na gcig pa nyid kyis thams cad mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'du ba 'di'i blo'i rgyu yin no snyam na gcig pa nyid kyis thams cad mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If you think that this inherence is the cause of the cognition, then all are the same because of their identity.

original: gal te mngon par 'dod pa nyid byed pa yin pas de'i byed pa bskyed pa yin pas ha cang thal bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te mngon par 'dod pa nyid byed pa yin pas de'i byed pa bskyed pa yin pas ha cang thal bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the effect is produced by the activity of the cause, since it is the activity of the cause that produces it, then the absurd consequence follows that the effect is produced by the activity of the cause.üîΩBut if you say that the effect is produced by the cause itself, since it is the cause that produces it, then the absurd consequence follows that the effect is produced by the cause itself.üîΩBut if you say that the effect is produced by the activity of the cause, since it is the activity of the cause that produces it, then the absurd consequence follows that the effect is produced by the activity of the cause.üîΩBut if you say that the effect is produced by the cause itself, since it is the cause that produces it, then the absurd consequence follows that the effect is produced by the cause itself.üîΩBut if you say that the effect is produced by the activity of the cause, since it is the activity of the cause that produces it, then the absurd consequence follows that the effect is produced by the activity of the cause.

original: 'o na ni des na de las skye bar de nyid la 'du bar brjod de de yang thams cad la mtshungs te /
analyzed: 'o na ni des na de las skye bar de nyid la 'du bar brjod de de yang thams cad la mtshungs te /
translated: But if you say that the effect is produced by the cause itself, since it is the cause that produces it, then the absurd consequence follows that the effect is produced by the cause itself.

original: gang gis byed pa'i 'bad pas skye ba yin na /üîΩdes 'bras bu nyid cis na mi skyed /
analyzed: gang gis byed pa'i 'bad pas skye ba yin na / des 'bras bu nyid cis na mi skyed /
translated: But if you say that the effect is produced by the activity of the cause, since it is the activity of the cause that produces it, then the absurd consequence follows that the effect is produced by the activity of the cause.üîΩBut if you say that the effect is produced by the cause itself, since it is the cause that produces it, then the absurd consequence follows that the effect is produced by the cause itself.

original: gang gis bar du chod pa la brten pa de lta na rang dang nye ba tsam gyi byed pa 'dis bskyed pa yin no //üîΩbyed pa gzhan gyis ni ma yin te thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //üîΩde lta na de nyid kyi phyir rang dang nye ba tsam gyi byed pas yin no zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: gang gis bar du chod pa la brten pa de lta na rang dang nye ba tsam gyi byed pa 'dis bskyed pa yin no // byed pa gzhan gyis ni ma yin te thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro // de lta na de nyid kyi phyir rang dang nye ba tsam gyi byed pas yin no zhes bshad zin to //
translated: But if you say that the effect is produced by the activity of the cause, since it is the activity of the cause that produces it, then the absurd consequence follows that the effect is produced by the activity of the cause.üîΩBut if you say that the effect is produced by the cause itself, since it is the cause that produces it, then the absurd consequence follows that the effect is produced by the cause itself.üîΩBut if you say that the effect is produced by the activity of the cause, since it is the activity of the cause that produces it, then the absurd consequence follows that the effect is produced by the activity of the cause.

original: de'i phyir phyis 'byung ba'i 'bras bu ni sngar yod pa rgyu'i byed pas yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir phyis 'byung ba'i 'bras bu ni sngar yod pa rgyu'i byed pas yin no //
translated: But if you say that the effect is produced by the cause itself, since it is the cause that produces it, then the absurd consequence follows that the effect is produced by the cause itself.üîΩBut if

original: de yang thams cad la yod pa yin no zhes thams cad kyi 'bras bu skyed pa'i byed par bstan te /
analyzed: de yang thams cad la yod pa yin no zhes thams cad kyi 'bras bu skyed pa'i byed par bstan te /
translated: Moreover, it is said that since it exists in all, it is the agent that produces the effect of all.

original: 'bras bu thams cad skyed bar byed pa de yod pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: 'bras bu thams cad skyed bar byed pa de yod pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: Because it exists, it produces all effects.

original: /'bras bu'i rgyur mngon par 'dod pa ni yod na yod pa ma yin pa gzhan las skye ba med do //
analyzed: /'bras bu'i rgyur mngon par 'dod pa ni yod na yod pa ma yin pa gzhan las skye ba med do //
translated: If it is asserted that it is the cause of the effect, then the effect does not arise from another that does not exist.

original: de ltar yod pa ni de nyid la rgyu'i byed pas 'bras bu byed pa 'di mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar yod pa ni de nyid la rgyu'i byed pas 'bras bu byed pa 'di mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible for that which exists to be the effect of a cause.

original: de'i phyir yod du zin kyang rgyu rnams la ji ltar nye bar dmigs par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i phyir yod du zin kyang rgyu rnams la ji ltar nye bar dmigs par mi 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, even if it exists, how could it be observed in the causes?

original: gal te de dang 'brel pa las skye ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de dang 'brel pa las skye ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is the cause of arising from the connection with it,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: med pa des 'brel par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa des 'brel par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not logical that it is connected with that which does not exist.

original: bdag nyid yod pa kho nas skyed pa'i don ni mi 'thad pa'i phyir skye ba'i dus na nye bar dmigs pa'i bdag nyid yin na sngar yang 'byung ba bzhin du dmigs par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid yod pa kho nas skyed pa'i don ni mi 'thad pa'i phyir skye ba'i dus na nye bar dmigs pa'i bdag nyid yin na sngar yang 'byung ba bzhin du dmigs par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it is untenable that an existent self is generated, if it is the self that is perceived at the time of arising, then it would have to be perceived previously, just as it occurs later.

original: ngo bo gzhan gyis yod pa yin na @237a * //
analyzed: ngo bo gzhan gyis yod pa yin na @237a * //
translated: If it exists by means of another nature,

original: ni dngos por mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ni dngos por mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would not be a thing.

original: dngos po ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i phyir dngos po tha dad do //
analyzed: dngos po ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i phyir dngos po tha dad do //
translated: Because a thing is different from another thing due to having a different characteristic.

original: de'i phyir nye bar dmigs pa'i bya ba'i bdag nyid kyi skye ba las sngar yod pa'i mi dmigs pa de'i phyir skye ba yang 'brel pa ga la yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir nye bar dmigs pa'i bya ba'i bdag nyid kyi skye ba las sngar yod pa'i mi dmigs pa de'i phyir skye ba yang 'brel pa ga la yin /
translated: Therefore, since the self that is the object of the action of perception does not exist prior to arising, how could arising be related to it?

original: de'i phyir 'bras bu ma byung ba nyid rgyu yod pa las byung ba des na skye ba yin no zhes thams cad kyis de ltar bskyed do //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'bras bu ma byung ba nyid rgyu yod pa las byung ba des na skye ba yin no zhes thams cad kyis de ltar bskyed do //
translated: Therefore, since the effect that has not yet arisen comes into existence from the existent cause, everyone generates it in that way.

original: 'on te gcig gis kyang de skyed par nus na gzhan dag de la de nye ba'i mtshan nyid kyi byed pa don med do snyam nas de la gzhan dag yod pa dang 'brel pa ma yin no zhes na /
analyzed: 'on te gcig gis kyang de skyed par nus na gzhan dag de la de nye ba'i mtshan nyid kyi byed pa don med do snyam nas de la gzhan dag yod pa dang 'brel pa ma yin no zhes na /
translated: Therefore, they are not related to its existence.

original: rang gi rgyu zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rang gi rgyu zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The response to that is ‚Äúits own cause.‚Äù

original: zhing dang chu dang sa bon gyi tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su gyur bas 'bras bu skyed ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i yon tan gyi bye brag dang ldan pa ni skad cig ma re re nye bar bsags pa phul du byung ba las skad cig ma gzhan
analyzed: zhing dang chu dang sa bon gyi tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su gyur bas 'bras bu skyed ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i yon tan gyi bye brag dang ldan pa ni skad cig ma re re nye bar bsags pa phul du byung ba las skad cig ma gzhan
translated: The transformation of the characteristics of the collection of field, water, and seed, which possesses the particular qualities that are suitable to produce the effect, from the accumulation of each instant, arises from the excellence of the other instants.

original: skye'o // des na nye ba ni 'bras bu dang yul nye ba rnams gang yin pa de ltar gyur ba la 'bras bu dang klan ka btsal bar 'os pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skye'o // des na nye ba ni 'bras bu dang yul nye ba rnams gang yin pa de ltar gyur ba la 'bras bu dang klan ka btsal bar 'os pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the proximity of the effect and the proximity of the place are not suitable to be criticized as the effect.

original: rgyu gcig gis kyang de'i 'bras bu nus pa'i phyir 'dir khyed nye bas ci zhig bya zhes brgal zhing brtag par 'os pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu gcig gis kyang de'i 'bras bu nus pa'i phyir 'dir khyed nye bas ci zhig bya zhes brgal zhing brtag par 'os pa ma yin no //
translated: Since even a single cause is able to produce its effect, it is not suitable to be disputed and investigated here, ‚ÄúWhat is the use of proximity?‚Äù

original: de la gzhan pa dang nye ba med na gcig gis kyang yod par mi skyed do //
analyzed: de la gzhan pa dang nye ba med na gcig gis kyang yod par mi skyed do //
translated: If it is not in contact with something else, even a single cause does not generate it.

original: gang las de'i rang bzhin yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang las de'i rang bzhin yin zhe na /
translated: What is the nature of that cause?üîΩThe nature of that cause is the primary thing, because the collection of field, water, seed, and so on is the nature that generates the transformation of the collection.

original: de'i rang bzhin las zhes bya ba ni dngos po gtso bor bstan te zhing dang chu dang sa bon la sogs pa'i tshogs pa yongs su gyur pa skyed pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir re re la nus pa de med do zhe na /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin las zhes bya ba ni dngos po gtso bor bstan te zhing dang chu dang sa bon la sogs pa'i tshogs pa yongs su gyur pa skyed pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir re re la nus pa de med do zhe na /
translated: If you think that each member of the collection lacks that power,

original: tshogs pa'i sgras brjod pa tha dad pa'i nus pas rang rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan pa skyed pa'i phyir dang de yang skad cig ma re re bsags pa phul du byung ba skyed pa'i phyir 'ba' zhig pa rnams la ni de skyed pa'i rang bzhin ma tshang ba
analyzed: tshogs pa'i sgras brjod pa tha dad pa'i nus pas rang rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan pa skyed pa'i phyir dang de yang skad cig ma re re bsags pa phul du byung ba skyed pa'i phyir 'ba' zhig pa rnams la ni de skyed pa'i rang bzhin ma tshang ba
translated: the power of each member of the collection is different because it is expressed by the term collection. Because each member generates its own individual characteristics, and because the collection of each instant of the collection generates the superior result, the individual members lack the nature to generate the result.

original: de las gzhan rkyen ni skyed bar rung ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir skyed pa'i byed par nus rgyu las so //
analyzed: de las gzhan rkyen ni skyed bar rung ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir skyed pa'i byed par nus rgyu las so //
translated: The other conditions are capable of generating the result because they have the nature of generating the result.

original: 'di yang ji ltar skabs su bab pa de dang der bsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di yang ji ltar skabs su bab pa de dang der bsal bar bya'o //
translated: This also should be cleared away in each case as it arises.

original: de'i phyir chogs pa skye ba'i rang bzhin dag yod pa gang yin pa de dang de la gcig med dam rgyu ma tshang ba las mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir chogs pa skye ba'i rang bzhin dag yod pa gang yin pa de dang de la gcig med dam rgyu ma tshang ba las mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, if the collection of causes is the nature of arising, then it is impossible for any of them to be absent or for the causes to be incomplete.

original: tshogs pa gcig pa las skye ba ni lhan cig 'byung bar nges te de dag yod na yod pa las 'bras bu thams cad skyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshogs pa gcig pa las skye ba ni lhan cig 'byung bar nges te de dag yod na yod pa las 'bras bu thams cad skyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Arising from a single collection is definitely co-arising, because when they exist, all effects arise from their existence.üîΩThere is no uncertainty here in the statement ‚ÄúArising from its own nature‚Äù and so on.

original: de'i ngo bo las skye ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dir ma nges pa med do zhes gang gis bsams @237b nas mtha' ma'i nus pas cis na skyed par mi byed ces sngar de bsal bar bshad do //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo las skye ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dir ma nges pa med do zhes gang gis bsams @237b nas mtha' ma'i nus pas cis na skyed par mi byed ces sngar de bsal bar bshad do //
translated: With this in mind, it was previously explained that the opponent‚Äôs position is cleared away by asking, ‚ÄúWhy does the final potency not generate?‚Äù

original: gal te nus pa dag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gal te nus pa dag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: If you say that potency is not a cause,

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas kyang mtha'am bskyed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa gang yin pa de ni bshad zin pa ston pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas kyang mtha'am bskyed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa gang yin pa de ni bshad zin pa ston pa ni ma yin te /
translated: the proponent of tenets says, ‚ÄúThe final potency generates.‚Äù The meaning of this is not explained.

original: de kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin reality‚Äù and so on is stated.

original: de dag nyid bshad pa ni gcig pu de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de dag nyid bshad pa ni gcig pu de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The passage beginning ‚ÄúThat alone which‚Ä¶‚Äù explains that.

original: 'di'i dgongs pa 'di nus pa dag mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa'i grub par byed pa dag gis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gi tha dad byed ba las rgyu mtshan gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di'i dgongs pa 'di nus pa dag mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa'i grub par byed pa dag gis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gi tha dad byed ba las rgyu mtshan gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The intention is this: The proof of the existence of the capacity of things is established by perception and non-perception, because there is no other reason for the distinction between positive and negative concomitance.

original: de yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gcig la mthong ba ni gzhan dag gzhan la ma yin la /
analyzed: de yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gcig la mthong ba ni gzhan dag gzhan la ma yin la /
translated: Moreover, the observation of positive and negative concomitance in one thing is not in another.

original: gcig pu de nyid bskyed par bya bar nus par rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: gcig pu de nyid bskyed par bya bar nus par rtogs par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that that alone is able to produce the effect.

original: gzhan dang gzhan ni bskyed par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dang gzhan ni bskyed par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: The other is not able to produce the effect.

original: de yang gang gi gnas skabs su skyed par mthong ba de cis skyed pa'i rang bzhin yin /
analyzed: de yang gang gi gnas skabs su skyed par mthong ba de cis skyed pa'i rang bzhin yin /
translated: Moreover, in what state is it seen to produce the effect? Is it by its very nature that it produces it?

original: de nyid yin nam yang na sngar yang yin zhes 'dir brtsod de /
analyzed: de nyid yin nam yang na sngar yang yin zhes 'dir brtsod de /
translated: Or is it that it was previously not that way? Here there is a dispute.

original: de la sngar yang de'i rang bzhin yin na phyi ma bzhin du ni snga ma yang skyed par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la sngar yang de'i rang bzhin yin na phyi ma bzhin du ni snga ma yang skyed par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were to have that nature, then, like the later, the earlier would also generate the effect.

original: skad cig ma re re tha dad par brjod na ni slar gzhan gcer bu pa dang / rgyal dpog bdag ma nges pa brjod cing smra ste /
analyzed: skad cig ma re re tha dad par brjod na ni slar gzhan gcer bu pa dang / rgyal dpog bdag ma nges pa brjod cing smra ste /
translated: If you say that each moment is different, then the Jains and Mƒ´mƒÅ·πÉsakas will again say:

original: tha dad pa phan tshun ldog pa mig la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag gi lhan cig byed pa dag gis cig car du byed pa rnams kyis rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid 'bras bu gcig pa skyed pa bden te phal cher tha dad pa'i rang bzhin
analyzed: tha dad pa phan tshun ldog pa mig la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag gi lhan cig byed pa dag gis cig car du byed pa rnams kyis rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid 'bras bu gcig pa skyed pa bden te phal cher tha dad pa'i rang bzhin
translated: ‚ÄúIt is true that the different eyes, etc., which are mutually exclusive, produce a single effect characterized by consciousness simultaneously through their collective action.

original: gyi rgyu rnams 'bras bu gcig tu tha dad pa'i rang bzhin yin na ni rgyu'i bye brag las 'bras bu'i bye brag med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gyi rgyu rnams 'bras bu gcig tu tha dad pa'i rang bzhin yin na ni rgyu'i bye brag las 'bras bu'i bye brag med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the different causes have a single effect that is different in nature, then the effect would not be different due to the difference in causes.

original: des na mig la sogs pa tha dad pa'i bdag nyid kyi 'bras bu gcig skyed par 'dod par mi bya ste /
analyzed: des na mig la sogs pa tha dad pa'i bdag nyid kyi 'bras bu gcig skyed par 'dod par mi bya ste /
translated: Therefore, you should not assert that different eyes, etc., produce a single effect.

original: 'on kyang tha mi dad pa'i 'bras bu gcig pa 'di skyed bar byed pa ni spyir gyur pa'i ngo bo khas blangs pa gang gis tha mi dad pa'i 'bras bu skyed do //
analyzed: 'on kyang tha mi dad pa'i 'bras bu gcig pa 'di skyed bar byed pa ni spyir gyur pa'i ngo bo khas blangs pa gang gis tha mi dad pa'i 'bras bu skyed do //
translated: But the production of a single effect that is not different from them is due to the acceptance of a universal entity that produces the effect that is not different from it.

original: de yang tshogs pa'i gnas skabs nyid la 'bras bu skye'i //
analyzed: de yang tshogs pa'i gnas skabs nyid la 'bras bu skye'i //
translated: Moreover, the effect is produced just at the time of the assemblage,

original: ma tshogs ba'i gnas skabs ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ma tshogs ba'i gnas skabs ni ma yin no //
translated: not at the time of the non-assemblage.

original: re re yod pa la de'i bdag nyid med pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: re re yod pa la de'i bdag nyid med pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that the existence of each one is not of the nature of that.

original: res 'gal med pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: res 'gal med pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the absence of the occasional is contradictory.

original: de 'di skyed bar byed pa'i rang bzhin ni skyed par byed pa dang skyed par mi byed pa ldan pa ni ma yin te /üîΩtshogs pa dang cig shos kyi gnas skabs tha @238a * //
analyzed: de 'di skyed bar byed pa'i rang bzhin ni skyed par byed pa dang skyed par mi byed pa ldan pa ni ma yin te / tshogs pa dang cig shos kyi gnas skabs tha @238a * //
translated: That nature of producing this is not compatible with producing and not producing,

original: dad pa thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dad pa thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: because the consequence is the difference of the state of the assemblage and the state of the other.

original: de lta na yang spyi'i rang bzhin nyams pa yin pa de'i phyir mig la sogs pa tshogs pa rnams skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa de ni re re yod du zin kyang skyed par byed pa ma yin gyi de ni ngo bo skyed pa'i phyirüîΩzhes bya ba ma nges pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na yang spyi'i rang bzhin nyams pa yin pa de'i phyir mig la sogs pa tshogs pa rnams skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa de ni re re yod du zin kyang skyed par byed pa ma yin gyi de ni ngo bo skyed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ma nges pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, ‚Äúbecause of the nature of the producer‚Äù is indefinite.

original: sgrub pa'i mtha' smra bas ma yin te /
analyzed: sgrub pa'i mtha' smra bas ma yin te /
translated: The proponent of the conclusion says, ‚ÄúNo, because of the nature of the self.‚Äù

original: bdag nyid ji lta ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: bdag nyid ji lta ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe nature of the self‚Äù and so on is stated.

original: 'di snyam du dgongs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du dgongs pa yin te /
translated: The thought is as follows.

original: ci byed kyang mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyu 'di mig la sogs pa re re las gal te yin na de mi rigs la //
analyzed: ci byed kyang mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyu 'di mig la sogs pa re re las gal te yin na de mi rigs la //
translated: Whatever is done, if the cause of the desired effect is each of the eye and so on, that is illogical.

original: tshogs pa'i rang bzhin las skye ba'i phyir 'bras bu rgyu ni de kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshogs pa'i rang bzhin las skye ba'i phyir 'bras bu rgyu ni de kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the effect arises from the nature of the collection, the cause is just that.

original: 'o na ni de'i gnas skabs na re re la sogs pa'i sgras brjod pa skyed pa'i rang bzhin du khas blangs pas mig la sogs pa re re rgyu yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni de'i gnas skabs na re re la sogs pa'i sgras brjod pa skyed pa'i rang bzhin du khas blangs pas mig la sogs pa re re rgyu yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you accept that the word each and so on generates the nature of each, then each eye and so on would be the cause.

original: gal te de ltar nges pa 'di la ci zhig yod /
analyzed: gal te de ltar nges pa 'di la ci zhig yod /
translated: What is the certainty in this?

original: gang khyed du ma las yin gyi gcig las ma yin no zhes bya ba la zlog pa la gnod par byed ba'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang khyed du ma las yin gyi gcig las ma yin no zhes bya ba la zlog pa la gnod par byed ba'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no valid cognition that contradicts the statement that it is from a plurality, not from a unity.

original: gcig de'i 'bras bu bya dgos so zhes bya ba nges pa ni ma mthong ste /
analyzed: gcig de'i 'bras bu bya dgos so zhes bya ba nges pa ni ma mthong ste /
translated: It is not seen that a unity must produce its effect.

original: gcig de'i 'bras bu byed do zhes bya ba gang las nges pa yin /
analyzed: gcig de'i 'bras bu byed do zhes bya ba gang las nges pa yin /
translated: From what is it ascertained that a unity produces its effect?

original: de yod pa las yod pa yin no zhes bya ba de 'dir du ma las 'di mtshungs so //
analyzed: de yod pa las yod pa yin no zhes bya ba de 'dir du ma las 'di mtshungs so //
translated: If you say that it exists because it exists, then this is the same as saying that it exists because of a plurality.

original: de skad cig de nyid skyed par nus kyi gzhan la ni ma yin pas gzhan dang gzhan bskyed pa ma yin no zhes bshad do ;
analyzed: de skad cig de nyid skyed par nus kyi gzhan la ni ma yin pas gzhan dang gzhan bskyed pa ma yin no zhes bshad do ;
translated: It is said that it is able to produce that moment, not another, and therefore it does not produce another.

original: / du ma yin pa las du ma thob pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: / du ma yin pa las du ma thob pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not that a plurality obtains from a plurality.

original: gang gi phyir kho bo cag gis khyed bzhin du rgyu kho nas 'bras bu'i bdag nyid du khas ma blangs te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir kho bo cag gis khyed bzhin du rgyu kho nas 'bras bu'i bdag nyid du khas ma blangs te /
translated: Because we do not accept that a cause is an effect‚Äôs essential nature, as you do.

original: gang du ma yongs su gyur pa las du ma'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu du mar 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: gang du ma yongs su gyur pa las du ma'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu du mar 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: If the cause were to transform into the effect, then the effect would be multiple because the cause has a multiple nature.

original: 'on kyang snga ma nyid 'ga' zhig yod par gyur pa de yang du ma yod pa nyid las yod pa'i phyir de'i 'bras bur brjod na de gang las du mar thal bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: 'on kyang snga ma nyid 'ga' zhig yod par gyur pa de yang du ma yod pa nyid las yod pa'i phyir de'i 'bras bur brjod na de gang las du mar thal bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: But if the cause were to exist prior to the effect, then the effect would be said to be the effect of that cause because it exists due to the existence of the multiple cause. But how could the effect be multiple?

original: gang yang tha mi dad par skyed par brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang yang tha mi dad par skyed par brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Also, because you say that the cause generates the effect without being different from it,

original: de gcig tu gnas kyang khyed kyi de'i 'bras bu skyed pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa de'i phyir 'bras bu skyed par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de gcig tu gnas kyang khyed kyi de'i 'bras bu skyed pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa de'i phyir 'bras bu skyed par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then even if the cause remains as one, it would still have the nature of generating the effect. Therefore it follows that the effect would be generated.

original: de gzhan nye ba dang de la bye brag med pa'i phyir ram de yang mi skyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de gzhan nye ba dang de la bye brag med pa'i phyir ram de yang mi skyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Or, because the cause would be without difference in relation to the effect, it would not generate the effect.

original: de'i phyir de rnams yod pa dang med pa dang ldan pa las rang gi 'bras bu yod pa dang med pa dang ldan pa mthong ste de nyid bye brag tu skyed pa yin pa'i phyir ma nges pa ga la yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir de rnams yod pa dang med pa dang ldan pa las rang gi 'bras bu yod pa dang med pa dang ldan pa mthong ste de nyid bye brag tu skyed pa yin pa'i phyir ma nges pa ga la yin /
translated: Therefore, since the existence, nonexistence, and possession of those causes are seen to be the existence, nonexistence, and possession of their effects, how could it be indeterminate, since it is the specific generator of those effects?

original: 'on te tshogs pa'i rgyu la brten par brjod na ni rgyu tha dad pas 'bras bu tha dad par mi @238b 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te tshogs pa'i rgyu la brten par brjod na ni rgyu tha dad pas 'bras bu tha dad par mi @238b 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if you say that it is based on the cause of the collection, then the effect would not be different because the causes are different.

original: de ni ma yin te ji ltar bdag nyid gang dang gang gi tshogs ba'i bdag nyid kyis rang bzhin de tha dad pas de khyad par la nye bar sbyar na de'i rnam par shes pa 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid gang gi khyad par ni tshogs pa'i ngo bo'i byeüîΩbrag gis de rnams la nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni ma yin te ji ltar bdag nyid gang dang gang gi tshogs ba'i bdag nyid kyis rang bzhin de tha dad pas de khyad par la nye bar sbyar na de'i rnam par shes pa 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid gang gi khyad par ni tshogs pa'i ngo bo'i byeüîΩbrag gis de rnams la nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: That is not so. Just as the nature of the collection is different by its own nature, if that difference is applied to the specific effect, then the consciousness of that effect, which is characterized by the effect, is applied to those specific effects because of the difference in the nature of the collection.

original: de'i nye bar sbyor bas tshogs pa tha dad pa'i byed pas bya ba'i rang bzhin gyi khyad bar ni bya ba dang khyad par can gyi rang bzhin de dag tshol ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i nye bar sbyor bas tshogs pa tha dad pa'i byed pas bya ba'i rang bzhin gyi khyad bar ni bya ba dang khyad par can gyi rang bzhin de dag tshol ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since the nature of the action and the nature of the distinction are not sought in the collection of causes, the distinction of the nature of the action by the action of a different collection is not tenable.

original: phan tshun tha dad pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir tshogs pa tha dad pa tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo'i 'bras bu yin na ji ltar rgyu tha dad ba las 'bras bu tha mi dad par 'gyur /
analyzed: phan tshun tha dad pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir tshogs pa tha dad pa tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo'i 'bras bu yin na ji ltar rgyu tha dad ba las 'bras bu tha mi dad par 'gyur /
translated: If the effect of a different collection has a non-different nature, how could the effect be non-different from the different causes?

original: de lta na tshogs pa gcig pa'i yid la byed pa yod pa'i nus pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid de las rnam bar rtog pa'i shes pa bskyed do //
analyzed: de lta na tshogs pa gcig pa'i yid la byed pa yod pa'i nus pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid de las rnam bar rtog pa'i shes pa bskyed do //
translated: Thus, the conceptual consciousness arises from that which has the characteristic of the capacity of the mental activity that is in the same collection.

original: gzhan yang 'di la byed pa dang dbang po tsam gyi mtshan nyid de las 'khrul pa'i dbang po'i shes pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di la byed pa dang dbang po tsam gyi mtshan nyid de las 'khrul pa'i dbang po'i shes pa 'byung ngo //
translated: Moreover, the sense consciousness that is mistaken arises from that which has the characteristic of mere action and mere sense faculty.

original: de las gzhan yul dang dbang po dang yid la byed pa'i bdag nyid de las ma 'khrul pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i phyir tshogs pa tha dad pas bskyed pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin khyad par ma 'chol ba yod pa nyid de tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid rgyu
analyzed: de las gzhan yul dang dbang po dang yid la byed pa'i bdag nyid de las ma 'khrul pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i phyir tshogs pa tha dad pas bskyed pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin khyad par ma 'chol ba yod pa nyid de tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid rgyu
translated: But in other cases, consciousness arises from a collection of objects, faculties, and attention, and therefore the nature of the effect is not confused, since the collections are different.

original: tha dad pas 'bras bu tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pas 'bras bu tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The cause is characterized by a collection of different things, because the effect is different.

original: 'o na ni gang gi tshe yul dang dbang po dang yid la byed pa rnams kyis rnam par shes pa skyed pa de'i tshe de dag nye bar sbyor ba'i yul gcig pa'i phyir ji ltar 'chol ba med pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni gang gi tshe yul dang dbang po dang yid la byed pa rnams kyis rnam par shes pa skyed pa de'i tshe de dag nye bar sbyor ba'i yul gcig pa'i phyir ji ltar 'chol ba med pa yin zhe na /
translated: But if the object, faculty, and attention generate consciousness, then at that time they are applied to the same object, so how can they be unconfused?

original: rnam pa de lta bu 'chol ba 'dod pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu 'chol ba 'dod pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: There is no error, because we accept that they are confused in that way.

original: de skad du de la gcig pus kyang nus zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad do //
analyzed: de skad du de la gcig pus kyang nus zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad do //
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúEven one of them can generate consciousness,‚Äù and so on.

original: de lta na ji ltar skyed bar byed pa yin /
analyzed: de lta na ji ltar skyed bar byed pa yin /
translated: If that is so, how can they generate consciousness?

original: gal te de dag tha dad pas 'bras bu tha dad pa ni med de /
analyzed: gal te de dag tha dad pas 'bras bu tha dad pa ni med de /
translated: If they are different, there is no difference in the effect.

original: 'on kyang tshogs pa rnams gzhan dang gzhan gyi 'bras bu skyes pa ni skyed par byed pa nyid de gang gi phyir med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on kyang tshogs pa rnams gzhan dang gzhan gyi 'bras bu skyes pa ni skyed par byed pa nyid de gang gi phyir med par 'gyur te /
translated: However, the collection of causes that produces another effect is the producer, because it is not nonexistent.

original: de dag gi skyed par byed pa de yod na 'ga' zhig yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gi skyed par byed pa de yod na 'ga' zhig yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If that producer exists, it exists as something.

original: de la gcig gam du ma yod pa de dag gcig gam du ma'i skyed par byed par brjod do //
analyzed: de la gcig gam du ma yod pa de dag gcig gam du ma'i skyed par byed par brjod do //
translated: If it is one or many, it is said to be the producer of one or many.

original: 'on ni tshogs pa gcig dang tshogs pa du ma'i dngos po skyed pas phan tshun tha dad par 'gyur na /
analyzed: 'on ni tshogs pa gcig dang tshogs pa du ma'i dngos po skyed pas phan tshun tha dad par 'gyur na /
translated: But if the collection of one and the collection of many produce a thing, they would be mutually different.

original: de dang de ma yin pa'i ngo bo'i rgyu las skyed pa nyid de dang de ma yin pa'i dngos por mi 'dod do //
analyzed: de dang de ma yin pa'i ngo bo'i rgyu las skyed pa nyid de dang de ma yin pa'i dngos por mi 'dod do //
translated: The cause of that and not that nature is the producer of that and not that nature.

original: de la gang gi tshe mig dang gzugs dang yid la byed pa rnams rnam par shes pa @239a * //
analyzed: de la gang gi tshe mig dang gzugs dang yid la byed pa rnams rnam par shes pa @239a * //
translated: When the eye, form, and attention are the conditions of the eye consciousness,

original: bskyed pa'i bdag nyid yin pa de'i tshe mig dang gzugs dag kyang rnam par shes pa'i dngos por tha mi dad pa'i rgyu las skyes pa'i phyir de dag gi rnam bar shes pa'i bdag nyid rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i bdag nyid yin pa de'i tshe mig dang gzugs dag kyang rnam par shes pa'i dngos por tha mi dad pa'i rgyu las skyes pa'i phyir de dag gi rnam bar shes pa'i bdag nyid rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: If the eye and form are the self of consciousness, then the eye and form would be the self of consciousness because they are born from a cause that is not different from the entity of consciousness.

original: de gzugs nyid du ji ltar thal bar mi 'gyur snyam du na //
analyzed: de gzugs nyid du ji ltar thal bar mi 'gyur snyam du na //
translated: Or, why would it not follow that they are consciousness itself?

original: de dang de min dngos po ni //
analyzed: de dang de min dngos po ni //
translated: Things that are not that

original: de dang de min rgyu las skyes //
analyzed: de dang de min rgyu las skyes //
translated: are born from a cause that is not that.

original: gzugs sogs cis te shes pa yin //
analyzed: gzugs sogs cis te shes pa yin //
translated: Why are form, etc. not consciousness?

original: rnam shes tha dad rgyu las skyes //
analyzed: rnam shes tha dad rgyu las skyes //
translated: Consciousness is born from a cause that is different.

original: zhes bshad pas /
analyzed: zhes bshad pas /
translated: Thus he explains.

original: nyes ba 'di dag med do //
analyzed: nyes ba 'di dag med do //
translated: These errors do not exist.

original: de dag ji ltar rang rang gi ngo bo tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan ni nye bar len pas der nye bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de dag ji ltar rang rang gi ngo bo tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan ni nye bar len pas der nye bar sbyar ro //
translated: The reason that they are different in their own natures is applied to them as appropriators.

original: yid la byed pa ni rnam par shes pa'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu ste /
analyzed: yid la byed pa ni rnam par shes pa'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu ste /
translated: Attention is the appropriating cause of consciousness.

original: dbang po ni rang gi rnam par shes pa'i skyed par rung ba skye ba ni lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: dbang po ni rang gi rnam par shes pa'i skyed par rung ba skye ba ni lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The faculty is the cause of the production of its own consciousness.

original: de bzhin gzhan dag la yang ci rigs bar brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gzhan dag la yang ci rigs bar brjod par bya'o //
translated: The same is to be said of the other causes as well.

original: des na gzhan 'dra ba'i tshogs pa dbang po'i skad cig ma skyed par byed pa ni rnam par shes pa dang mi 'dra ba'i phyir mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'o //
analyzed: des na gzhan 'dra ba'i tshogs pa dbang po'i skad cig ma skyed par byed pa ni rnam par shes pa dang mi 'dra ba'i phyir mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'o //
translated: Thus, the dissimilar effect of a dissimilar cause is the production of a group of similar others, such as the moment of the sense faculty, which is dissimilar to the consciousness.

original: ci ste de dag thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa de'i tshe dbang po la sogs pa'i skad cig ma 'di tha dad ba ga la yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste de dag thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa de'i tshe dbang po la sogs pa'i skad cig ma 'di tha dad ba ga la yin zhe na /
translated: But if all of them conform to the rule of concomitance and nonconcomitance, how can the moments of the sense faculty, etc., be different?

original: 'di dag nye bar len pa'i dngos pos 'di nye bar sbyor gyi gzhan la ni lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen yin pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: 'di dag nye bar len pa'i dngos pos 'di nye bar sbyor gyi gzhan la ni lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen yin pa'i phyir ;
translated: They are connected by the appropriation of the aggregates, but they are not the cooperating conditions of each other.

original: rtogs pa'i ngo bo la phan 'dogs pa dang phan mi 'dogs pa dag ste yod pa la mi 'khrul pa dang 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i ngo bo la phan 'dogs pa dang phan mi 'dogs pa dag ste yod pa la mi 'khrul pa dang 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: They are helpful or not helpful to the nature of the cognition, and they are not mistaken or mistaken with regard to the existent.

original: de lta na rnam par shes pa rtogs pa'i ngo bor yid la byed pas phan 'dogs pa'i phyir dbang po bems po'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no zhes gzhan la'ang de bzhin du shes bar bya'o //
analyzed: de lta na rnam par shes pa rtogs pa'i ngo bor yid la byed pas phan 'dogs pa'i phyir dbang po bems po'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no zhes gzhan la'ang de bzhin du shes bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, since the mental faculty is the cause of the understanding of consciousness, it is not the nature of an insentient sense faculty.

original: rnam par shes pa tsam gyi dngos po ni de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi byed pa las yin par nges pa nyid dbang po la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa tsam gyi dngos po ni de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi byed pa las yin par nges pa nyid dbang po la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The existence of mere consciousness is definitely the result of the activity of the condition as the equivalent and immediately antecedent condition, not of the sense faculties and so on.

original: dbang po'i skad cig ma phyi ma skyed pa ni snga ma'i dbang po las phyi ma yin gyi rang gi rnam par shes par rung ba'i rgyu mtshungs pa de ma thag pa ni rkyen ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po'i skad cig ma phyi ma skyed pa ni snga ma'i dbang po las phyi ma yin gyi rang gi rnam par shes par rung ba'i rgyu mtshungs pa de ma thag pa ni rkyen ma yin no //
translated: The production of the subsequent moment of the sense faculty is from the prior sense faculty, not from the immediately preceding condition that is suitable as its own consciousness.

original: de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: The same should be said of form and so on.

original: de'i phyir gnas skabs tha dad kyang rnam pa gcig tu nges par byed pa'i shes pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis rang gi rgyun 'byung ba'i 'bras bu skyed pa'i rgyu mtshan yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas skabs tha dad kyang rnam pa gcig tu nges par byed pa'i shes pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis rang gi rgyun 'byung ba'i 'bras bu skyed pa'i rgyu mtshan yin te /
translated: Therefore, although they are different states, they are the cause of producing the result that arises in their own continuum through the sign of consciousness that ascertains them as being of one type.

original: de ni nye bar len pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni nye bar len pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the substantial cause.

original: gang rgyun gzhan ni sngar gyi gnas skabs la @239b ltos nas khyad par la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan de lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: gang rgyun gzhan ni sngar gyi gnas skabs la @239b ltos nas khyad par la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan de lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu yin te /
translated: The other continuum is the cooperative cause, because it is the reason for the distinction, etc., in relation to the previous state.

original: de yang dngos po 'di rnams rang gi rgyu brgyud pa las 'ongs pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de yang dngos po 'di rnams rang gi rgyu brgyud pa las 'ongs pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Moreover, the nature of these entities comes from their own causal continuum.

original: cung zad cig rang gi 'bras bu'i rgyun rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu mtshan skyed pa yin te /
analyzed: cung zad cig rang gi 'bras bu'i rgyun rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu mtshan skyed pa yin te /
translated: A certain part of the continuum is the reason for the production of the effect.

original: gzhan yang rgyun gzhan du brjod pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang rgyun gzhan du brjod pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, it is the reason for the expression of another continuum.

original: de nyid kyi tshogs pa gzhan gyis bye brag tu byas pa'i phyir dbang po dang / gzugs dang rnam par shes pa'i skad cig ma rnams ni phan tshun mtshan nyid mi mthun pa la 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshogs pa gzhan gyis bye brag tu byas pa'i phyir dbang po dang / gzugs dang rnam par shes pa'i skad cig ma rnams ni phan tshun mtshan nyid mi mthun pa la 'gal ba med do //
translated: Since it is distinguished by another assemblage, there is no contradiction in the moments of the sense faculty, form, and consciousness being different in nature.

original: de'i phyir gang gi tshe re re'i rgyu du ma yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i bye brag nyid yin pa de'i tshe 'brel ba med pas ma nges par 'gyur na de yang khas blangs pa'i phyir ci yang med do //üîΩ'on te tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rgyu'i bye brag gi tshogs pa gzhan las 'bras bu'i bye brag kyang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa de'i phyir rgyu rnams las rang bzhin tha dad par brjod pa de'i tshe de 'dir med pas ji ltar rgyu'i bye brag las 'bras bu'i
analyzed: de'i phyir gang gi tshe re re'i rgyu du ma yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i bye brag nyid yin pa de'i tshe 'brel ba med pas ma nges par 'gyur na de yang khas blangs pa'i phyir ci yang med do // 'on te tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rgyu'i bye brag gi tshogs pa gzhan las 'bras bu'i bye brag kyang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa de'i phyir rgyu rnams las rang bzhin tha dad par brjod pa de'i tshe de 'dir med pas ji ltar rgyu'i bye brag las 'bras bu'i
translated: Therefore, when the cause of each is multiple, and the difference of the effect is due to that, then, since there is no connection, it would be indeterminate. But since that is accepted, there is nothing at all.üîΩBut if the difference of the effect is due to the difference of the cause that has the characteristic of an assemblage, and the assemblage is different from another assemblage, then, since the effect is different from that, it is said that it is different from the cause. But in that case, since it does not exist here, how could the difference of the effect be due to the difference of the cause?

original: bye brag tu ma 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bsam pa ni rgyu'i bye brag las 'bras bu'i bye brag tu mi 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes gang las yin zhe na /
analyzed: bye brag tu ma 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bsam pa ni rgyu'i bye brag las 'bras bu'i bye brag tu mi 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes gang las yin zhe na /
translated: The idea is that the difference of the effect is not due to the difference of the cause. From what is that known?

original: bdag nyid ci lta ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do //
analyzed: bdag nyid ci lta ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do //
translated: It is said: ‚ÄúIt is just as it is itself.‚Äù

original: gnyis ga yang 'di dag gi 'bras bur tshad mas mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba bstan pa ni dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gnyis ga yang 'di dag gi 'bras bur tshad mas mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba bstan pa ni dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The valid cognition that sees these two as effects is taught by ‚ÄúFor example,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'jim pa'i gong bu la sogs pa dag las byung pa'i bum pa rgyu du ma yin du zin kyang du ma'i ngo bor mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jim pa'i gong bu la sogs pa dag las byung pa'i bum pa rgyu du ma yin du zin kyang du ma'i ngo bor mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Even though a vase arises from a lump of clay and so on, it does not become multiple in nature, even though its causes are multiple.

original: chogs pa gzhan gyis bskyed pa ma yin pas tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo 'di dpe brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chogs pa gzhan gyis bskyed pa ma yin pas tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo 'di dpe brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since it is not generated by another collection, it is not a different entity. This is the example.

original: de la tshogs pa gzhan gyis bskyed pa ni re zhig tha dad par bstan pa ni 'jig pa'i gong bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de la tshogs pa gzhan gyis bskyed pa ni re zhig tha dad par bstan pa ni 'jig pa'i gong bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In that regard, ‚Äúgenerated by another collection‚Äù is first taught to be different. ‚ÄúA lump of clay,‚Äù and so on, is stated.

original: 'dir 'jig pa'i gong bu dang rdza mkhan dang skud pa ma tshogs pa'i rang bzhin ni rgyu gzhan pa dang lhan cig pas so phag la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid gzhan gyis bskyed pas dngos po tha dad pa'i 'bras bu rnams sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir 'jig pa'i gong bu dang rdza mkhan dang skud pa ma tshogs pa'i rang bzhin ni rgyu gzhan pa dang lhan cig pas so phag la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid gzhan gyis bskyed pas dngos po tha dad pa'i 'bras bu rnams sgrub pa yin no //
translated: Here, the nature of a lump of clay, a potter, and thread that is not assembled is generated by another characteristic, such as a brick, through being a different cause. Therefore, different entities are established as effects.

original: tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid mi mthun pa de dag gis bum pa'i bdag nyid skyed pa de bzhin du rdza mkhan la sogs pa la ltos pa med pa 'jim pa'i gong bu de las gzhan skyed pa'i shing la sogs pa mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i nye bar len paüîΩlas byung bas sa'i bdag nyid kyi @240a * //üîΩ'bras bu skye ba mthong ngo //
analyzed: tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid mi mthun pa de dag gis bum pa'i bdag nyid skyed pa de bzhin du rdza mkhan la sogs pa la ltos pa med pa 'jim pa'i gong bu de las gzhan skyed pa'i shing la sogs pa mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i nye bar len pa las byung bas sa'i bdag nyid kyi @240a * // 'bras bu skye ba mthong ngo //
translated: And the vase that is the nature of that is seen to arise from the lump of clay that is dependent on the potter and so on, and from the dissimilar appropriated causes that are other than that, such as the wheel and so on.üîΩAnd the vase that is the nature of that is seen to arise from the lump of clay that is dependent on the potter and so on, and from the dissimilar appropriated causes that are other than that, such as the wheel and so on.

original: rdza mkhan la sogs pa dang lhan cig pas kyang de'i bdag nyid kyi bum pa de'i rgyus byas pa'i bye brag ni 'jim pa'i gong bu 'ba' zhig las tha dad pa'i ngo bos de'i 'bras bu la sogs pa dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa byed do //
analyzed: rdza mkhan la sogs pa dang lhan cig pas kyang de'i bdag nyid kyi bum pa de'i rgyus byas pa'i bye brag ni 'jim pa'i gong bu 'ba' zhig las tha dad pa'i ngo bos de'i 'bras bu la sogs pa dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa byed do //
translated: And the vase that is the nature of that is seen to arise from the lump of clay that is dependent on the potter and so on, and from the dissimilar appropriated causes that are other than that, such as the wheel and so on.

original: de ltar rdza mkhan la sogs pas kyang gzhan gyi nye bar len pa'i lhan cig byed pa'i dngos pos 'bras bu byed pa gang yin pa de ni mtshan nyid mi mthun pa nyid 'jim gong dang lhan cig tu de'i rgyus byed pa'i bye brag can dag bum pa'i
analyzed: de ltar rdza mkhan la sogs pas kyang gzhan gyi nye bar len pa'i lhan cig byed pa'i dngos pos 'bras bu byed pa gang yin pa de ni mtshan nyid mi mthun pa nyid 'jim gong dang lhan cig tu de'i rgyus byed pa'i bye brag can dag bum pa'i
translated: Thus, the potter and so on, by the power of the other's appropriated cooperative conditions, produce the effect. That which is of a different nature from the clay lump, by the cause of that, produces the effect of the nature of the pot, which is qualified by the shape.

original: bdag nyid kyi 'bras bu skyed do zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi 'bras bu skyed do zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to //
translated: This is the summarized meaning.

original: de la 'jim pa'i gong bu las tha dad pa'i rang bzhin bum pa las gzhan pa'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu de ni 'jim pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa shing la sogs pa de rnams las 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de la 'jim pa'i gong bu las tha dad pa'i rang bzhin bum pa las gzhan pa'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu de ni 'jim pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa shing la sogs pa de rnams las 'byung ngo //
translated: There, the cause of appropriation different from the clay lump, which is of a different nature from the pot, arises from those which are not the nature of clay, such as wood.

original: rdza mkhan dang 'jim pa'i gong bu'i nye bar len pa'i byed pa phul du byung ba la lhan cig byed pa'i dngos pos nye bar sbyor bas bum pa de nyid kyi 'jim pa'i gong bu'i nye bar len pas sa'i bdag nyid yin pa de nyid dbyibs kyi bye
analyzed: rdza mkhan dang 'jim pa'i gong bu'i nye bar len pa'i byed pa phul du byung ba la lhan cig byed pa'i dngos pos nye bar sbyor bas bum pa de nyid kyi 'jim pa'i gong bu'i nye bar len pas sa'i bdag nyid yin pa de nyid dbyibs kyi bye
translated: By the excellence of the potter's and clay lump's appropriated activity, the pot is connected by the power of the cooperative conditions. By that very appropriation of the clay lump, it is of the nature of earth. That very shape is the cause of the pot.

original: brag chu 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa de'i bdag nyid kyis de las gzhan pa gang dag 'jim pa'i gong bu de las gzhan pa'i rgyu mtshan dang nye bar len pa'i rgyu lhan cig tu so phag la sogs pa ni de dag las tha dad pa'i ngoüîΩbor 'gyur te /üîΩskud pa las ni 'jim pa'i gong bu dang rdza mkhan gyi rgyus byas pa'i bye brag las bum pa de nyid sa'i dbyibs kyi bye brag ni 'jim pa'i gong bu la rdza mkhan dag de skyed pa'i ngo bo yin phyir bum pa'i ngo bor rigs so //
analyzed: brag chu 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa de'i bdag nyid kyis de las gzhan pa gang dag 'jim pa'i gong bu de las gzhan pa'i rgyu mtshan dang nye bar len pa'i rgyu lhan cig tu so phag la sogs pa ni de dag las tha dad pa'i ngo bor 'gyur te / skud pa las ni 'jim pa'i gong bu dang rdza mkhan gyi rgyus byas pa'i bye brag las bum pa de nyid sa'i dbyibs kyi bye brag ni 'jim pa'i gong bu la rdza mkhan dag de skyed pa'i ngo bo yin phyir bum pa'i ngo bor rigs so //
