analyzed: des na gang gi tshe 'jim pa'i gong bu ni 'jim pa'i bdag nyid byed pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, when the clay lump is the maker of the clay,

original: de yang rdzas khan gyis ni dbyibs kyi bye brag byed par brjod pa de'i tshe de dag shin tu tha dad pas rgyu du ma nyid las 'bras bu du ma nyid 'thob bo //
analyzed: de yang rdzas khan gyis ni dbyibs kyi bye brag byed par brjod pa de'i tshe de dag shin tu tha dad pas rgyu du ma nyid las 'bras bu du ma nyid 'thob bo //
translated: Moreover, when it is said that the shape is produced by the clay, since they are completely different, the effect is obtained from the multiplicity of causes.

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas bshad zin to zhes bya ba smos so //üîΩ'jim pa dang dbyings rang bzhin tha dad pa las 'jim pa dang / dbyibs dag phan tshun bdag nyid can ma yin zhes bya ba @247a * //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas bshad zin to zhes bya ba smos so // 'jim pa dang dbyings rang bzhin tha dad pa las 'jim pa dang / dbyibs dag phan tshun bdag nyid can ma yin zhes bya ba @247a * //
translated: The proponent of tenets says, ‚ÄúThis has already been explained.‚Äù

original: la sogs pa'i skyon bshad zin to //
analyzed: la sogs pa'i skyon bshad zin to //
translated: The fault has already been explained, that the clay and the shape are different by nature, and that the clay and the shape do not have the nature of each other.

original: dbyibs las 'jim pa'i rdzas gzhan pa ni ma yin te /üîΩde'i phyir 'jim pa'i gong bu nye bar len pa phul du byung bas byas pa de'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid la rdza mkhan ni lhan cig byed pa yin la //
analyzed: dbyibs las 'jim pa'i rdzas gzhan pa ni ma yin te / de'i phyir 'jim pa'i gong bu nye bar len pa phul du byung bas byas pa de'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid la rdza mkhan ni lhan cig byed pa yin la //
translated: The clay is not different from the shape.üîΩTherefore, the potter is the co-creator of the effect that is produced by the clay lump that is the predominant condition.

original: de'i nye bar len pa'i bdag nyid kyis byas pa de'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid la 'jim pa'i gong du ni lhan cig byed ba so so ba 'am /
analyzed: de'i nye bar len pa'i bdag nyid kyis byas pa de'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid la 'jim pa'i gong du ni lhan cig byed ba so so ba 'am /
translated: The clay lump is the individual co-creator of the effect that is produced by its own nature.

original: ma lus pa nyid las 'jim pa'i dbyibs kyi bdag nyid kyi 'bras bu byed pa'i phyir rgyu du ma las kyang 'di du ma nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: ma lus pa nyid las 'jim pa'i dbyibs kyi bdag nyid kyi 'bras bu byed pa'i phyir rgyu du ma las kyang 'di du ma nyid ma yin no //
translated: because the effect, which is the shape of the clay, is produced from the clay itself.

original: 'dir gtan tshigs lhag pa bshad pa ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'dir gtan tshigs lhag pa bshad pa ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Here, the additional reason is stated:

original: bum par gtogs pa'i dbyibs gang yin pa de /
analyzed: bum par gtogs pa'i dbyibs gang yin pa de /
translated: Moreover, the shape that belongs to the pot

original: gang gi tshe de 'jim pa las 'jim pa tha dad par gyur pa de'i tshe rdza mkhan gyis ci'i phyir logs shig tu mi byed tha dad pa ni gdon mi za bar logs shig tu mi byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe de 'jim pa las 'jim pa tha dad par gyur pa de'i tshe rdza mkhan gyis ci'i phyir logs shig tu mi byed tha dad pa ni gdon mi za bar logs shig tu mi byed pa ma yin no //
translated: If that shape were different from the clay, then why wouldn't the potter make it separately? For what is different must be made separately, without a doubt.

original: rdza mkhan gyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis de dbyibs kyi rgyur rtogs par bya ba'i phyir de logs shig tu byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdza mkhan gyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis de dbyibs kyi rgyur rtogs par bya ba'i phyir de logs shig tu byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: But the potter would make it separately in order to understand that shape as the cause of the clay, through the process of following and reversing.

original: gzhan yang gal te yon tan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te rdzas la brten pa'i yon tan ldan pa ma yin pa ldan pa'i rnam par dbye ba rnams rgyu ma yin pa la mi ltos pa zhes bya ba la yon tan gyi mtshan nyid thams cad
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te yon tan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te rdzas la brten pa'i yon tan ldan pa ma yin pa ldan pa'i rnam par dbye ba rnams rgyu ma yin pa la mi ltos pa zhes bya ba la yon tan gyi mtshan nyid thams cad
translated: Moreover, if the so-called qualities and so on are not dependent on substance, the divisions of the possessor of qualities are not dependent on a cause.üîΩAll the characteristics of qualities are dependent on substance.

original: du yon tan ni rdzas kyi gzhan gyi dbang yin pas de ji ltar res 'ga' zhig logs shig tu byed pa yin /
analyzed: du yon tan ni rdzas kyi gzhan gyi dbang yin pas de ji ltar res 'ga' zhig logs shig tu byed pa yin /
translated: How could qualities sometimes be made separately?

original: bye brag pa nyid sangs rgyas pa la rtsod par dogs pa ni gal te rang bzhin gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /üîΩgal te rang bzhin gyis dbyibs ni de'i yon tan gyi bdag nyid yin te /
analyzed: bye brag pa nyid sangs rgyas pa la rtsod par dogs pa ni gal te rang bzhin gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / gal te rang bzhin gyis dbyibs ni de'i yon tan gyi bdag nyid yin te /
translated: The Vaise·π£ika doubts that the Buddhist is arguing: If shape is the nature of its quality,üîΩit is said that shape is the nature of its quality because it is the nature of its action.

original: bya ba dang ldan pa las dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod pas rdzas de ni rten gyi rang bzhin nam /
analyzed: bya ba dang ldan pa las dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod pas rdzas de ni rten gyi rang bzhin nam /
translated: The substance that possesses action is said to possess shape and so on.

original: dbyibs ni gyo mog ni rnam pa de lta bu'o //
analyzed: dbyibs ni gyo mog ni rnam pa de lta bu'o //
translated: The shape of a pot is like that.

original: de la rag las pa bdag nyid yin na de'i tshe rdza mkhan gyi byed pa la ltos pa ci zhig dgos rang nyid kho na ci'i phyir ma yin zhes rtsod pa'i bsam pas de ltar bye brag pa rtsod par dogs pa la lan bshad pa ni ma yin
analyzed: de la rag las pa bdag nyid yin na de'i tshe rdza mkhan gyi byed pa la ltos pa ci zhig dgos rang nyid kho na ci'i phyir ma yin zhes rtsod pa'i bsam pas de ltar bye brag pa rtsod par dogs pa la lan bshad pa ni ma yin
translated: This is not a response to the fear of a debate with the Vaise~ika, with the thought that they would argue in this way.

original: te de las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: te de las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The response is from that, etc.,

original: 'jim pa'i rdzas su chu 'dzin par byed pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de'i dbyibs de dag gi 'bras bu dang 'brel pa rten pa dang brten pa'i mtshan @247b nyid do //
analyzed: 'jim pa'i rdzas su chu 'dzin par byed pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de'i dbyibs de dag gi 'bras bu dang 'brel pa rten pa dang brten pa'i mtshan @247b nyid do //
translated: The shape of the clay that holds water, etc. is the effect of those, and it is related to them. It is characterized by the supported and the support.

original: de la rung ba gang yin pa de ni gnyi ga yang yin no //
analyzed: de la rung ba gang yin pa de ni gnyi ga yang yin no //
translated: That which is suitable is both.

original: de rdza mkhan las gang thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rdza mkhan las gang thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is obtained from the potter.

original: de'i phyir rdza mkhan la ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdza mkhan la ltos pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it relies on the potter.

original: rdza mkhan la mi ltos pa'i skyon ni de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rdza mkhan la mi ltos pa'i skyon ni de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The fault of not relying on the potter is stated by if it were not so, etc.,

original: gang gi tshe de dag phan tshun 'brel par rung ba 'di rdza mkhan la ltos pa ma yin na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de dag phan tshun 'brel par rung ba 'di rdza mkhan la ltos pa ma yin na /
translated: When they are suitable to be mutually related, and this is not dependent on the potter,

original: de'i tshe 'jim pa'i rang bzhin kho na rnam pa de lta bu dbyibs dang 'brel par rung ba nyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'jim pa'i rang bzhin kho na rnam pa de lta bu dbyibs dang 'brel par rung ba nyid do //
translated: then at that time, the nature of the clay itself is suitable to be related to that shape.

original: de la yang dngos po kho nar gyur pa'i dbyibs dang 'brel par rung ba'i chos yod pa'i rdza mkhan dang nye ba las sngon yang dbyibs kyi khyad par dang 'brel par 'gyur snyam pa'i bye brag pa'i rtsod pa'i lan ni grub pa'i mtha' smra bas de la yin
analyzed: de la yang dngos po kho nar gyur pa'i dbyibs dang 'brel par rung ba'i chos yod pa'i rdza mkhan dang nye ba las sngon yang dbyibs kyi khyad par dang 'brel par 'gyur snyam pa'i bye brag pa'i rtsod pa'i lan ni grub pa'i mtha' smra bas de la yin
translated: The response to the Vaise~ika argument that the clay itself, which is a real entity, is suitable to be related to a particular shape, and that when it is in the presence of the potter, it becomes related to a particular shape, is stated by the Vaibha~ika proponent:

original: na zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: na zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: If it is like that,

original: gang gi phan tshun 'brel par rung ba ni rdza mkhan la sogs pa dang ltos pa de lta yin na 'o na 'jim pa'i rdzas kyi rung ba rdza mkhan las gyur ba 'thob pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phan tshun 'brel par rung ba ni rdza mkhan la sogs pa dang ltos pa de lta yin na 'o na 'jim pa'i rdzas kyi rung ba rdza mkhan las gyur ba 'thob pa yin no //
translated: if that which is suitable to be mutually related is dependent on the potter, etc., then the suitability of the clay substance would be obtained from the potter.

original: 'jim pa'i rdzas dang rung ba 'di gnyis so //
analyzed: 'jim pa'i rdzas dang rung ba 'di gnyis so //
translated: These two, the clay substance and its suitability,

original: rang bzhin tha dad pa du ma ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin tha dad pa du ma ma yin pa'o //
translated: are not multiple different natures.

original: gang gi tshe rung ba nyid ma yin pa de ni rdzas las logs shig tu byed par snga ma bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rung ba nyid ma yin pa de ni rdzas las logs shig tu byed par snga ma bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is not suitable, then it follows that it is separate from the substance, as before.

original: yang na rung ba yin na yang rdzas kyi gzhan dbang yin pas logs shig tu grub par brjod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na rung ba yin na yang rdzas kyi gzhan dbang yin pas logs shig tu grub par brjod pa ma yin te /
translated: Or, even if it is suitable, since it is dependent on the substance, it is not said to be established separately.

original: de'i tshe de yang dngos po'i chos nyid kho nas snga ma bzhin du 'brel par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas rdzas dang lhan cig 'brel par rung ba dang gzhan rdza mkhan las byung ba'i rung bar 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe de yang dngos po'i chos nyid kho nas snga ma bzhin du 'brel par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas rdzas dang lhan cig 'brel par rung ba dang gzhan rdza mkhan las byung ba'i rung bar 'dod par bya'o //
translated: At that time, since it is not related to the substance by the nature of things, as before, it should be asserted that suitability is related to the substance, and that the suitability of the potter's product is different.

original: de yang logs shig byed par thal bar 'gyur bas rdzas la tha dad pa'i rang bzhin du khas blangs bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: de yang logs shig byed par thal bar 'gyur bas rdzas la tha dad pa'i rang bzhin du khas blangs bar mi bya ste /
translated: Since it also follows that it is separate, it should not be accepted as having a different nature from the substance.

original: logs shig byed pa'i thal ba yang 'gyur ba de nyid kyis lan gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: logs shig byed pa'i thal ba yang 'gyur ba de nyid kyis lan gdab par bya'o //
translated: The consequence of being separate should be answered by the same reasoning.

original: yang de nyid kyi lan yin na ni thug pa med par thal bas gdon mi za bar g-yo mog gi bdag nyid dang 'jim pa'i rdzas kyi rung ba dag rang bzhin tha mi dad par khas blangs bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang de nyid kyi lan yin na ni thug pa med par thal bas gdon mi za bar g-yo mog gi bdag nyid dang 'jim pa'i rdzas kyi rung ba dag rang bzhin tha mi dad par khas blangs bar bya'o //
translated: If you say that the latter is the answer to the former, then it follows that there is an infinite regress, and so you must definitely accept that the nature of the clay and the nature of the substance of the clay are not different.

original: de lta yin na cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de lta yin na cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If that is so, what follows?

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas re zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas re zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The Proponent of the View responds: ‚ÄúFirst, the clay and the potter are related to the substance of the clay, which is the cause of the clay pot.

original: 'jim pa'i gong bu dang rdza mkhan dag gi g-yo mog gi rdzas dang ldan pa'i khyad par gyi 'brel par rung ba skyed pa'i phyir gcig gi rang bzhin la yang gcig la rkyen du mas khyad par du bya ba'i bye brag nyid gang yin pa de grub bo
analyzed: 'jim pa'i gong bu dang rdza mkhan dag gi g-yo mog gi rdzas dang ldan pa'i khyad par gyi 'brel par rung ba skyed pa'i phyir gcig gi rang bzhin la yang gcig la rkyen du mas khyad par du bya ba'i bye brag nyid gang yin pa de grub bo
translated: Since the clay and the potter are related to the substance of the clay, which is the cause of the clay pot, it is established that even in the nature of one thing, there are many conditions that create distinctions.

original: // @248a * //  kho bo cag gi phyogs de las kyang kho bo cag 'jim pa dang dbyibs dag rang bzhin gcig pa nyid du sgrub pa la shin tu 'bad pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: // @248a * //  kho bo cag gi phyogs de las kyang kho bo cag 'jim pa dang dbyibs dag rang bzhin gcig pa nyid du sgrub pa la shin tu 'bad pas ci zhig bya /
translated: Since we go to great lengths to prove that the clay and the shape are of the same nature, what is the point of this for us?

original: gang gi tshe rung ba la brten na yang rkyen du mas skyed pa'i gcig pa yang du ma nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba 'grub ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rung ba la brten na yang rkyen du mas skyed pa'i gcig pa yang du ma nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba 'grub ste /
translated: When it is suitable to rely on that, even if one is generated by many conditions, it follows that one is many.

original: 'bras bu ni rdzas dang yon tan dang ldan pa spangs pas 'dir dogs pa ci yang med kyi gzhan pa nyid de spong bar byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni rdzas dang yon tan dang ldan pa spangs pas 'dir dogs pa ci yang med kyi gzhan pa nyid de spong bar byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dgongs pa yin no //
translated: The result is the abandonment of substance and quality, and here there is no doubt at all. The intended meaning is that it is in order to abandon that otherness.

original: 'bad par 'dzin pas kyang 'jim pa dang dbyibs dag phan tshun bdag nyid ma yin pa 'di gnyis dbyibs dang 'jim pa'i khyad par gyi ngo bo dag tu mi snang bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'thad pa 'dis sgrub pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'bad par 'dzin pas kyang 'jim pa dang dbyibs dag phan tshun bdag nyid ma yin pa 'di gnyis dbyibs dang 'jim pa'i khyad par gyi ngo bo dag tu mi snang bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'thad pa 'dis sgrub pa nyid de /
translated: Also, by the apprehension of effort, it follows that the clay and shape, which are not mutually identical, do not appear as the nature of the difference of shape and clay. This is the proof by the reasoning that it is tenable.

original: 'dis gcig pa nyid rigs pa gzhan srid kyang de rjod par byed pa'i mtshan nyid la 'thad pa mi byed de rang bzhin gyis grub pa las gzhan du yang 'byung ba yin no zhes brjod do //
analyzed: 'dis gcig pa nyid rigs pa gzhan srid kyang de rjod par byed pa'i mtshan nyid la 'thad pa mi byed de rang bzhin gyis grub pa las gzhan du yang 'byung ba yin no zhes brjod do //
translated: This is because even if another reasoning for identity is possible, it does not make sense in terms of the definition that expresses that. It is said that it occurs in a way that is different from that which is established by nature.

original: de lta na de ni tshogs pa tha dad pa las tshogs pa gzhan skyed pas tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na de ni tshogs pa tha dad pa las tshogs pa gzhan skyed pas tha dad pa yin no //
translated: In that case, since it produces another collection from a different collection, it is different.

original: lhan cig byed pa rnams du ma las kyang 'bras bu gcig pa nyid la 'gal ba med de zhes bstan pa'i phyir mjug bsdu ba ni des na dngos su zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa rnams du ma las kyang 'bras bu gcig pa nyid la 'gal ba med de zhes bstan pa'i phyir mjug bsdu ba ni des na dngos su zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to demonstrate that there is no contradiction in a single effect arising from many co-operating causes, he concludes with ‚ÄúTherefore, the collection of causes and conditions . . .‚Äù and so forth.üîΩSince the collection of causes and conditions that produces the effect is not different from the effect, the collection of causes and conditions that produces the effect is not different from the effect.

original: gang gis rkyen gzhan bsags pa de'i tshogs pa ma tshang pa las tshogs pa gzhan skyed do //
analyzed: gang gis rkyen gzhan bsags pa de'i tshogs pa ma tshang pa las tshogs pa gzhan skyed do //
translated: Since that also arises from the previous collection, it produces a different effect.

original: de yang tshogs pa snga ma las skye bas tha dad pa'i 'bras bu gzhan nyid skyed pa dang / tshogs pa gcig par bstan pa yul la lhan cig byed pa du ma nyid kyang du ma gcig byed pa la 'gal ba med pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa'i 'bras bu gcig mthong ba'i phyir rang bzhin gcig pa nyid sgrub par
analyzed: de yang tshogs pa snga ma las skye bas tha dad pa'i 'bras bu gzhan nyid skyed pa dang / tshogs pa gcig par bstan pa yul la lhan cig byed pa du ma nyid kyang du ma gcig byed pa la 'gal ba med pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa'i 'bras bu gcig mthong ba'i phyir rang bzhin gcig pa nyid sgrub par
translated: Since it is demonstrated that the single collection is the object of the co-operating causes, there is no contradiction in many producing a single effect. Therefore, since a single effect is seen that conforms with the presence and absence of the causes, it proves that they have a single nature.

original: byed pa'i rgyu des na lhan cig byed pa ni lhan cig byed pa'i ngag tshul can tshogs pa gcig pa'i nang du 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa'i rgyu des na lhan cig byed pa ni lhan cig byed pa'i ngag tshul can tshogs pa gcig pa'i nang du 'dus pa'o //
translated: The causal condition is the collection of the other conditions, i.e., the co-operating causes, which are the causes of the effect in question.üîΩThe co-operating causes are the collection of the other conditions, i.e., the co-operating causes, which are the causes of the effect in question.üîΩThe co-operating causes are the collection of the other conditions, i.e., the co-operating causes, which are the causes of the effect in question.

original: rkyen ni tshogs pa gzhan pa'i lhan cig la nye bar sbyor ba med de yul gcig la nye bar sbyor ba gang yin pa de ma yin no //üîΩtshogs pa gzhan pa nyid ni lhan cig pa tha dad pa'i yul la nye bar sbyor ba'i rigs pa'i stobs kyis rtogs so //
analyzed: rkyen ni tshogs pa gzhan pa'i lhan cig la nye bar sbyor ba med de yul gcig la nye bar sbyor ba gang yin pa de ma yin no // tshogs pa gzhan pa nyid ni lhan cig pa tha dad pa'i yul la nye bar sbyor ba'i rigs pa'i stobs kyis rtogs so //
translated: The co-operating causes are the collection of the other conditions, i.e., the co-operating causes, which are the causes of the effect in question.üîΩThe co-operating causes are the collection of the other conditions, i.e., the co-operating causes, which are the causes of the effect in question.üîΩThe co-operating causes are the collection of the other conditions, i.e., the co-operating causes, which are the causes of the effect in question.üîΩThe co-operating causes are the collection of the other conditions, i.e., the co-operating causes, which are the causes of the effect in question.üîΩThe co-operating causes are the collection of the other conditions, i.e., the co-operating causes, which are the causes of the effect in question.üîΩThe co-operating causes are the collection of the other conditions, i.e., the co-operating causes, which are the causes of the effect in question.üîΩThe co-operating causes are the collection of the other conditions, i.e., the co-operating causes, which are the causes of the effect in question.üîΩThe co-operating causes are the collection of the other conditions, i.e., the co-operating causes, which are the causes of the effect in question.üîΩThe co-operating causes are the collection of the other conditions, i.e., the co-operating causes, which are the causes of the effect in question.üîΩThe co-operating causes are the collection of the other conditions, i.e., the co-operating causes, which are the causes of the effect in question.üîΩThe co-operating causes are the collection of the other conditions, i.e., the co-operating causes, which are the causes of the effect in question.

original: gang sngar rnam par rtogs pa 'dis gang gi tshe byed pa'i sgras ni tshogs par brjod pa de'i tshe tha dad pa yod pa de ni tshogs pa rnams @248b las skye ba yin no //üîΩ'bras tu tha dad pa yin no zhes bya bas ci zhig brjod ce na rgyu tha dad pas tha dad pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gang sngar rnam par rtogs pa 'dis gang gi tshe byed pa'i sgras ni tshogs par brjod pa de'i tshe tha dad pa yod pa de ni tshogs pa rnams @248b las skye ba yin no // 'bras tu tha dad pa yin no zhes bya bas ci zhig brjod ce na rgyu tha dad pas tha dad pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The co-operating causes are the collection of the other conditions, i.e., the co-operating causes, which are the causes of the effect in question.

original: 'di dag gi dpe bstan pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: 'di dag gi dpe bstan pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o //
translated: The co-operating

original: yang na rgyu'i sgras ni tshogs par bshad pa'i yul lhan cig byed par brjod do //
analyzed: yang na rgyu'i sgras ni tshogs par bshad pa'i yul lhan cig byed par brjod do //
translated: Or else, the word ‚Äúcause‚Äù refers to the object that is explained as the collection, the cooperating causes.

original: de'i tshe tha dad pas du ma'i mtshan nyid las 'bras bu du ma'i mtshan nyid tha dad par mi 'dod ba kho na ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe tha dad pas du ma'i mtshan nyid las 'bras bu du ma'i mtshan nyid tha dad par mi 'dod ba kho na ste /
translated: At that time, it is not maintained that the effect has a different nature, a plurality, from the cause, which has a different nature, a plurality,

original: du ma'i byed pa la 'gal ba med pas gcig pa du ma nyid las skye ba mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: du ma'i byed pa la 'gal ba med pas gcig pa du ma nyid las skye ba mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no contradiction in the activity of a plurality, and because the arising of a single effect from a plurality of causes is seen.

original: 'jim pa dang dbyibs dag bdag nyid gcig par bstan pa'i mjug bsdu ba ni 'jim pa dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid kyi 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gcig pa nyid kyang du ma'i rang bzhin ma yin pa yang ngo //
analyzed: 'jim pa dang dbyibs dag bdag nyid gcig par bstan pa'i mjug bsdu ba ni 'jim pa dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid kyi 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gcig pa nyid kyang du ma'i rang bzhin ma yin pa yang ngo //
translated: The summary of the demonstration that clay and shape are the same nature is: ‚ÄúThe nature of the effect, which is the nature of clay and shape, is not a plurality, even though it is a single nature.‚Äù

original: dngos su ni don dam par ro //
analyzed: dngos su ni don dam par ro //
translated: In reality, ultimately.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i blo la 'jim pa dang dbyibs dag tha dad par snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i blo la 'jim pa dang dbyibs dag tha dad par snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because clay and shape appear to the conceptual mind as different.

original: de skad du tshogs pa tha dad pas 'bras bu tha dad pa ni du ma'i tshogs pa'i yul la rkyen tha dad pas du ma'i 'bras bu yin pa'i dpe bstan pa ni mig la sogs pa gang skyed pa'i gnas skabs so //
analyzed: de skad du tshogs pa tha dad pas 'bras bu tha dad pa ni du ma'i tshogs pa'i yul la rkyen tha dad pas du ma'i 'bras bu yin pa'i dpe bstan pa ni mig la sogs pa gang skyed pa'i gnas skabs so //
translated: Thus, the example of the different effects of different collections is taught: in the case of the object of a collection of many, the effect is many due to the different conditions.

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba smos pa ni dpe'o //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba smos pa ni dpe'o //
translated: ‚Äú Just as‚Äù is the example.

original: rgyu tha dad pa ni tshogs pa tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu tha dad pa ni tshogs pa tha dad pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Different causes‚Äù are different collections.

original: rdza mkhan ma tshang ba'i 'jim pa'i gong bu'i dang de lhan cig skud pa dbang du byas pa'i tshogs pa rnam pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid tha dad pa rnams rang bzhin du ma'i bye brag rnams ni so phag dang 'khor los gcod pa dang bum pa de'i rnam
analyzed: rdza mkhan ma tshang ba'i 'jim pa'i gong bu'i dang de lhan cig skud pa dbang du byas pa'i tshogs pa rnam pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid tha dad pa rnams rang bzhin du ma'i bye brag rnams ni so phag dang 'khor los gcod pa dang bum pa de'i rnam
translated: The clay lump, which is not complete without the potter, and the three types of collections that are controlled by the thread, have different characteristics. The different types of nature are the distinctions of the brick, the wheel, and the pot.

original: par dbye ba ni bum pa'i mtshan nyid la nye bar sbyor bas 'bras bu gcig ma yin no //
analyzed: par dbye ba ni bum pa'i mtshan nyid la nye bar sbyor bas 'bras bu gcig ma yin no //
translated: The distinctions are not one effect, because they are applied to the characteristics of the pot.

original: 'on kyang 'bras bu tha dad pa kho na ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'bras bu tha dad pa kho na ste /
translated: However, they are definitely different effects.

original: de bzhin du rnam pa de nyid kyis mig la sogs pa las mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam pa de nyid kyis mig la sogs pa las mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ste /
translated: by way of that very mode.

original: tshogs pa gzhan pa'i tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i rgyu las 'bras bu du ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa gzhan pa'i tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i rgyu las 'bras bu du ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The result should be understood as multiple from a cause that is a different collection, i.e., a different character, of collections.

original: de nyid rnam par dbye ba ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nyid rnam par dbye ba ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The analysis of that very mode is stated by ‚Äújust as, etc.‚Äù

original: gang mig gi ngo bo spangs pa'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen du bshad pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: gang mig gi ngo bo spangs pa'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen du bshad pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: That which is explained as the similar and immediately antecedent condition, having abandoned the nature of the eye, is the character of visual consciousness.

original: rkyen gzhan la ltos pa dang bcas pa de las rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: rkyen gzhan la ltos pa dang bcas pa de las rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: From that, which is dependent on other conditions, there is conceptual consciousness.

original: cig shos de nye bar brten nas rtog pa'i ngo bo dang nye bar dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa yang 'gyur ro //üîΩmig gi rnam par shes pa de nyid nye bar dmigs pa'i bdag @249a * //
analyzed: cig shos de nye bar brten nas rtog pa'i ngo bo dang nye bar dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa yang 'gyur ro // mig gi rnam par shes pa de nyid nye bar dmigs pa'i bdag @249a * //
translated: Or, the other, i.e., visual consciousness, is supported by that, and it has the nature of conceptualization and is also supported by apprehension.

original: nyid ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: nyid ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is the nature of that visual consciousness itself, which is supported?

original: de las byung ba'i skye ba de nyid 'bras bu gcig ba so sor nges pa ste mig gi dbang po dang nye ba la las ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i nye bar len gyis byas pa de las gzugs 'dzin par so sor nges pa'i gzugs kyi rnamüîΩpa so sor nges pa'o //üîΩsgra la sogs pa'i rnam pas dben pa nyid kyi 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i skye ba de nyid 'bras bu gcig ba so sor nges pa ste mig gi dbang po dang nye ba la las ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i nye bar len gyis byas pa de las gzugs 'dzin par so sor nges pa'i gzugs kyi rnam pa so sor nges pa'o // sgra la sogs pa'i rnam pas dben pa nyid kyi 'bras bu ste /
translated: The result of that is the form that is determined to be the object of the eye consciousness, which is determined to apprehend form.üîΩThe result of that is the form that is determined to be the object of the eye consciousness, which is determined to apprehend form.üîΩThe result of that is the form that is determined to be the object of the eye consciousness, which is determined to apprehend form.üîΩThe result of that is the form that is determined to be the object of the eye consciousness, which is determined to apprehend form.

original: mig dang lhan cig pa'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyis tshogs pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir yul la dbang byed pa'o //
analyzed: mig dang lhan cig pa'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyis tshogs pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir yul la dbang byed pa'o //
translated: The result of that is the form that is determined to be the object of the eye consciousness, which is determined to apprehend form.üîΩThe result of that is the form that is determined to be the object of the eye consciousness, which is determined to apprehend form.üîΩThe result of that is the form that is determined to be the object of the eye consciousness, which is determined to apprehend form.üîΩThe result of that is the form that is determined to be the object of the eye consciousness, which is determined to apprehend form.üîΩThe result of that is the form that is determined to be the object of the eye consciousness, which is determined to apprehend form.üîΩThe result of that is the form that is determined to be the object of the eye consciousness, which is determined to apprehend form.üîΩThe result of that is the form that is determined to be the object of the eye consciousness, which is determined to apprehend form.üîΩThe result of that is the form that is determined to be the object of the eye consciousness, which is determined to apprehend form.üîΩThe result of that is the form that is determined to be the object of the eye consciousness, which is determined to apprehend form.üîΩThe result of that is the form that is determined to be the object of the eye consciousness, which is determined to apprehend form.

original: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen dang dbang po de dang yul ni 'dra ba'i ngo bo nyid de gzugs de 'ba' zhig pa snang ba ni 'khrul pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma yin no zhes yul dang dbang po dang yid la byed pa tshogs pa'i mtshan
analyzed: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen dang dbang po de dang yul ni 'dra ba'i ngo bo nyid de gzugs de 'ba' zhig pa snang ba ni 'khrul pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma yin no zhes yul dang dbang po dang yid la byed pa tshogs pa'i mtshan
translated: The result of that is the form that is determined to be the object of the eye consciousness, which is determined to apprehend form.

original: nyid kyi 'bras bu kho nar bstan to //
analyzed: nyid kyi 'bras bu kho nar bstan to //
translated: The

original: de dang gzhan pa'i 'bras bu gcig pa dang gnyis skye ba ni rang nyid kyis brtags pa ni 'di tha dad pa yang dngos po'i 'bras bu ste /üîΩmig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rgyu rnams yul dang dbang po dang yid pa byed pa rnams kyi ngo bo 'ba' zhig de dag ngo bo de las tha dad pa nyid de /
analyzed: de dang gzhan pa'i 'bras bu gcig pa dang gnyis skye ba ni rang nyid kyis brtags pa ni 'di tha dad pa yang dngos po'i 'bras bu ste / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rgyu rnams yul dang dbang po dang yid pa byed pa rnams kyi ngo bo 'ba' zhig de dag ngo bo de las tha dad pa nyid de /
translated: The effect of one thing and the effect of two things are the same, and the effect of two things is the same as the effect of one thing.üîΩThe causes of the eye consciousness, such as the eye faculty, the object, and mental activity, are not different from the nature of the eye consciousness.

original: des bskyed pa'i bye brag rnams rtogs pa'i ngo bo la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des bskyed pa'i bye brag rnams rtogs pa'i ngo bo la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: The eye consciousness is not different from the nature of the eye faculty, the object, and mental activity.

original: de'i phyir skyed bar byed pa la ltos nas gcig gi bdag nyid kyang du mar bstan to //
analyzed: de'i phyir skyed bar byed pa la ltos nas gcig gi bdag nyid kyang du mar bstan to //
translated: Therefore, in dependence on the producer, the one nature is taught to be many.

original: de ltar na gang gi phyir zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ltar na gang gi phyir zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
translated: Thus, ‚Äúbecause‚Äù means ‚Äúfor that reason.‚Äù

original: rgyu tha dad pa ma yin yang ji ltar tshogs pa gcig gi nang du 'dus pa'i rkyen kyang tha mi dad pa de bzhin du tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad kyang tha mi dad do //
analyzed: rgyu tha dad pa ma yin yang ji ltar tshogs pa gcig gi nang du 'dus pa'i rkyen kyang tha mi dad pa de bzhin du tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad kyang tha mi dad do //
translated: Although the causes are not different, just as the conditions that are included in a single collection are not different, in the same way, although the characteristics of the collection are different, they are not different.

original: tshogs pa gzhan skyes pa rnams kyi 'bras bu'i khyad par ni 'bras bu khyad par can no zhes bya ba des gang brjod pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa gzhan skyes pa rnams kyi 'bras bu'i khyad par ni 'bras bu khyad par can no zhes bya ba des gang brjod pa'o //
translated: The difference in the effect of other collections that have arisen is called the special effect.

original: gal te lhan cig byed pa rnams kyang 'bras bu tha mi dad par 'gyur ba ni tshogs pa tha dad kyang tha mi dad pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te lhan cig byed pa rnams kyang 'bras bu tha mi dad par 'gyur ba ni tshogs pa tha dad kyang tha mi dad pa yod pa yin no //
translated: If the co-operators are not different in their effect, then even though the collections are different, they are not different.

original: 'on te tshogs pa tha dad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on te tshogs pa tha dad par 'gyur te /
translated: But if the collections are different,

original: lhan cig byed pa tha dad kyang cis na tha mi dad par 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa tha dad kyang cis na tha mi dad par 'gyur ba yin /
translated: then even though the co-operators are different, why are they not different?

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because there is no difference.

original: de ni bsal ba yin te de la phan tshun 'dus pa la brten nas rkyen gyi khyad par las 'bras bu gcig bar bstan pa dang gcig la gcig gi rgyun la phan 'dogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ni bsal ba yin te de la phan tshun 'dus pa la brten nas rkyen gyi khyad par las 'bras bu gcig bar bstan pa dang gcig la gcig gi rgyun la phan 'dogs pa ste /
translated: That is refuted: In that case, the effect is taught to be one on the basis of mutual aggregation and the special conditions, and it is helpful to the continuum of each.

original: lhan cig byed pa so sor nges pa'i nus pa rnams las skyes @249b pa'i 'bras bu gcig mi skyed do //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa so sor nges pa'i nus pa rnams las skyes @249b pa'i 'bras bu gcig mi skyed do //
translated: The effect that arises from the individual determined potencies of the co-operators does not produce a single effect.

original: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i 'bras bu gzhan skyed par nus pa dang 'brel pa rnams ni gzhan pa las yin te /
analyzed: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i 'bras bu gzhan skyed par nus pa dang 'brel pa rnams ni gzhan pa las yin te /
translated: The other effect, the effect of similar outcome is related to the power to generate other effects.

original: rang bzhin tha dad pa dang ldan pa yod pas 'bras bu tha dad pa skyed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang bzhin tha dad pa dang ldan pa yod pas 'bras bu tha dad pa skyed pa'i phyir /
translated: It is the effect of different action because it generates different effects since it possesses different natures.

original: gang las khyad par med pa yin /üîΩ'o na ni 'bras bu sgrub par byed pa'i gzhi ni ji ltar rten pa'i ngo bo de 'byung ba dag gis bskyed ba de ni gzhan pa nyid la brten pa yin no zhes khyed 'dod pa de bzhin du gzhan rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu
analyzed: gang las khyad par med pa yin / 'o na ni 'bras bu sgrub par byed pa'i gzhi ni ji ltar rten pa'i ngo bo de 'byung ba dag gis bskyed ba de ni gzhan pa nyid la brten pa yin no zhes khyed 'dod pa de bzhin du gzhan rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu
translated: From what is it not different?üîΩIf you assert that the basis that establishes the effect is the nature of the support and that is generated by the primary elements, then the effect of different action is also the effect of different action since it is related to the power to generate other effects.

original: la yang yin na /
analyzed: la yang yin na /
translated: In that case, just as you assert that the basis that establishes the effect is related to the power to generate other effects, so too the effect of different action is related to the power to generate other effects such as consciousness.

original: de'i phyir 'dis kyang rgyu cung zad cig la brten pa dang / de'i rgyu snga ma ni skyed par byed pa nyid 'bras bu phyi ma'i rten nyid de skyed pa ma yin pa de'i phyir de ni ngo bo yis skyed pa yin no zhes bya ba de dag ma nges pa'i gnas skabs su 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dis kyang rgyu cung zad cig la brten pa dang / de'i rgyu snga ma ni skyed par byed pa nyid 'bras bu phyi ma'i rten nyid de skyed pa ma yin pa de'i phyir de ni ngo bo yis skyed pa yin no zhes bya ba de dag ma nges pa'i gnas skabs su 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Therefore, this also is based on some cause, and that prior cause is the producer itself, the basis of the later effect, but not the producer. Therefore, it is not certain that it is produced by its own nature.

original: rgyu'i nus pa tha dad pa de dag kho na zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rgyu'i nus pa tha dad pa de dag kho na zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Those very different potencies of the cause are said to be the specific potencies of the causes.

original: bshad ma thag pa'i rgyu'i nus pa tha dad pa ni rgyu rnams kyi nus pa'i khyad par ro ;
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i rgyu'i nus pa tha dad pa ni rgyu rnams kyi nus pa'i khyad par ro ;
translated: The different potencies of the causes just explained are the specific potencies of the causes.

original: / ci 'dra ba'i bdag nyid ji lta ba de dag gi rgyu'i nus pa tha dad pa rnams lhan cig byed pa'i mtshan nyid gang gi bdag nyid kyi tshogs pas skyed pa'i phyir khyad par can gyi 'bras bu skyed pa'o //
analyzed: / ci 'dra ba'i bdag nyid ji lta ba de dag gi rgyu'i nus pa tha dad pa rnams lhan cig byed pa'i mtshan nyid gang gi bdag nyid kyi tshogs pas skyed pa'i phyir khyad par can gyi 'bras bu skyed pa'o //
translated: The specific effect is produced by the collection of those different potencies of the causes, which have the characteristic of being co-producing agents, in accordance with their nature.

original: bar du chod pa med pa ni bar du gcod pa 'am gas byed par mi nus pa ste nus pa med pa gang gi dngos po de dag gi nus pa chod pa med pa'o //üîΩgdon mi za bar 'bras bu byed par nus par nye bar gnas so zhes bshad do //
analyzed: bar du chod pa med pa ni bar du gcod pa 'am gas byed par mi nus pa ste nus pa med pa gang gi dngos po de dag gi nus pa chod pa med pa'o // gdon mi za bar 'bras bu byed par nus par nye bar gnas so zhes bshad do //
translated: The power of those things is not obstructed.

original: tshogs pa yod ba'i 'bras bu ni rkyen gcig las skye ba ni res 'ga' yang mi srid pas thams cad tshogs pa kho nas 'bras bu byed pa'i phyir chogs pa 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid gnas pa'i rten yin no zhes brjod do //
analyzed: tshogs pa yod ba'i 'bras bu ni rkyen gcig las skye ba ni res 'ga' yang mi srid pas thams cad tshogs pa kho nas 'bras bu byed pa'i phyir chogs pa 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid gnas pa'i rten yin no zhes brjod do //
translated: The effect of an assemblage is not produced from a single condition, because it is impossible for that to occur. Therefore, since the effect is produced only by the assemblage, the assemblage is the basis for the effect‚Äôs existence.

original: ci'i phyir nus pa chod pa tshod pa med pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir nus pa chod pa tshod pa med pa yin zhe na /
translated: Why is the power of the assemblage not obstructed?

original: skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is momentary.

original: skad cig ma'i nus pa la gags bya bar mi nus so //
analyzed: skad cig ma'i nus pa la gags bya bar mi nus so //
translated: The power of a moment cannot be obstructed.

original: rang bzhin gzhan la brten pa bzhin du ji srid 'brel pas byed pa de srid du skad cig ma rang gi 'bras bu byas nas 'gag ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gzhan la brten pa bzhin du ji srid 'brel pas byed pa de srid du skad cig ma rang gi 'bras bu byas nas 'gag ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Just as a nature that is dependent on another produces as long as the connection exists, so too a moment produces its effect and then ceases.

original: ji ltar dus mi mnyam pa'i rgyu rten du sbyor ba yin zhe na /üîΩ'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te gang gi phyir rnam par shes ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'bras bu de dag kyang mig la sogs pa'i ngo bo ma lus pa dag las rtogs pa @250a * //
analyzed: ji ltar dus mi mnyam pa'i rgyu rten du sbyor ba yin zhe na / 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te gang gi phyir rnam par shes ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'bras bu de dag kyang mig la sogs pa'i ngo bo ma lus pa dag las rtogs pa @250a * //
translated: How can a cause of different time be a support?üîΩThus, etc.üîΩThe effect that has the characteristic of consciousness is understood to arise from the totality of the entities of the eye, etc.,

original: pa la sogs pa gzhan las de ma yin pa'i khyad par can skyed do //
analyzed: pa la sogs pa gzhan las de ma yin pa'i khyad par can skyed do //
translated: and from other things, such as light, etc., which are not those, i.e., the eye, etc.

original: rang gi ngo bo la cha shas su 'bras bu mi skyed pas re re las ma lus ba nyid 'byung bas gcig skyed pa de'i phyir rten du bshad do //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo la cha shas su 'bras bu mi skyed pas re re las ma lus ba nyid 'byung bas gcig skyed pa de'i phyir rten du bshad do //
translated: Since the effect is not produced in parts from its own entity, the totality arises from each. Therefore, it is called a support.

original: skyed par byed pa las gzhan pa nyid phan 'dogs par byed pa yin gyi phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni rten ma yin te ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyed par byed pa las gzhan pa nyid phan 'dogs par byed pa yin gyi phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni rten ma yin te ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is other than a producer is a helper, but that which does not help is not a support, because that would be absurd.

original: de'i phyir dus tha dad pa rten pa'i dngos por 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir dus tha dad pa rten pa'i dngos por 'gal ba med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no contradiction in the fact that different times are related as support and the supported.

original: gang yang 'byung ba rnams rten pa'i ngo bo 'jug par brjod do //
analyzed: gang yang 'byung ba rnams rten pa'i ngo bo 'jug par brjod do //
translated: Moreover, the elements are said to be related as support and the supported because they are engaged in the production of the effect.

original: de yang rang gi yul 'di skyed par byed pa nyid yin no zhes snga ma'i 'byung ba skyed par byed pa ni phyi ma 'jog pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de yang rang gi yul 'di skyed par byed pa nyid yin no zhes snga ma'i 'byung ba skyed par byed pa ni phyi ma 'jog pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The cause of the generation of the prior primary elements is the cause of the establishment of the subsequent.üîΩSince this is uncertain, another says, ‚ÄúIt is the cause of the generation of its nature.‚ÄùüîΩHere, the uncertainty is stated.

original: gang gi phyir ma nges pa yin gzhan yang de'i ngo bo skyed pa yin no zhes bya ba 'dir ma nges par brjod par gyur par gzhan dag dgos pa na gal te nus pa 'gog pa med pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ma nges pa yin gzhan yang de'i ngo bo skyed pa yin no zhes bya ba 'dir ma nges par brjod par gyur par gzhan dag dgos pa na gal te nus pa 'gog pa med pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: If the opponent says that it is necessary, then he says, ‚ÄúIf there is no obstruction to its potentiality,‚Äù

original: 'gog pa med pa ni 'gags byed pa'i nus pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa med pa ni 'gags byed pa'i nus pa med pa'o //
translated: because the absence of obstruction is the absence of the potentiality to obstruct.

original: gang dag nus pa 'gog pa med pa de ni 'bras bu mjug thogs pa yin pa'i phyir gang skyes pa'i dus la mi sdod pa'i 'bras bu byed pa de dag kyang nus pa 'gogs pa ma yin gyi skyes pa'i mjug thogs su 'bras bu byed do //
analyzed: gang dag nus pa 'gog pa med pa de ni 'bras bu mjug thogs pa yin pa'i phyir gang skyes pa'i dus la mi sdod pa'i 'bras bu byed pa de dag kyang nus pa 'gogs pa ma yin gyi skyes pa'i mjug thogs su 'bras bu byed do //
translated: Those for whom there is no obstruction to potentiality are the immediate result of the cause, because they are the result of what is generated. Therefore, those that do not delay in producing a result at the time of their generation are not obstructed by potentiality. They produce a result immediately after they are generated.

original: skad cig ma 'di zad pa la gnod pa byed pa med la phan 'dogs pa spong bar brjod pa ni khyad par du bogs dbyung du med pa dag ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: skad cig ma 'di zad pa la gnod pa byed pa med la phan 'dogs pa spong bar brjod pa ni khyad par du bogs dbyung du med pa dag ces bya ba smos te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthey are not enhanced‚Äù means that there is no harm in the destruction of this moment and there is no benefit in its cessation.

original: de yang khyad par bogs dbyung du med pa'i skad cig ma rnams zhes bya ba 'dis skad cig ma bye brag tu byed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de yang khyad par bogs dbyung du med pa'i skad cig ma rnams zhes bya ba 'dis skad cig ma bye brag tu byed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do //
translated: This is explained as follows: ‚ÄúThe phrase ‚Äòmoments that are not enhanced‚Äô cannot specify moments because they are not enhanced.‚Äù

original: khyad par du bogs 'byin pas lhan cig 'byung ba'i mjug thogs te skye ba'i phyir dang de'i tshe de 'gags pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde rnams la rnam pa de lta bu'i rkyen rnams phan tshun lhan cig byed pa'i don ci gzhig yin gang gis lhan cig byed par brjod /
analyzed: khyad par du bogs 'byin pas lhan cig 'byung ba'i mjug thogs te skye ba'i phyir dang de'i tshe de 'gags pa'i phyir ro // de rnams la rnam pa de lta bu'i rkyen rnams phan tshun lhan cig byed pa'i don ci gzhig yin gang gis lhan cig byed par brjod /
translated: Because they are enhanced, they arise immediately after the primary elements that are their cause, and at that time they cease.üîΩWhat is the meaning of the mutual simultaneity of conditions in this way? What is the meaning of the expression ‚Äúthey are not enhanced‚Äù?

original: 'on te khyad par bogs dbyung du med pa nyid kyis lhan cig byed pa nyid med do zhes bstan pa'i don 'di ci zhig yin /
analyzed: 'on te khyad par bogs dbyung du med pa nyid kyis lhan cig byed pa nyid med do zhes bstan pa'i don 'di ci zhig yin /
translated: What is the meaning of the expression ‚Äúthey are not enhanced‚Äù?

original: nus pa 'gog pa med do zhes bya ba'i nus pa 'gog par byed pa'i lhan cig byed par brjod pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: nus pa 'gog pa med do zhes bya ba'i nus pa 'gog par byed pa'i lhan cig byed par brjod pa med do zhe na /
translated: There is no expression of a cooperating cause that negates potency.

original: bden te / thams cad du de la cung zad cig byed pa med par shes par bya ba'i don du 'di dag bshad do //
analyzed: bden te / thams cad du de la cung zad cig byed pa med par shes par bya ba'i don du 'di dag bshad do //
translated: It is true, but these are explained in order to make it understood that it does not function in any way at all.

original: nus pa @250b la gegs byed pa med pas phan 'dogs ba nyid du btags pa'i lhan cig byed pa ni 'gags pa de'i phyir khyad par phul du byung ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa @250b la gegs byed pa med pas phan 'dogs ba nyid du btags pa'i lhan cig byed pa ni 'gags pa de'i phyir khyad par phul du byung ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since there is no obstruction to potency, the cooperating cause is designated as helpful. Since it is obstructed, it is not possible for it to be a special cause.

original: skad cig ma rnams rang gi rgyu tsam dang 'brel pa nyid skyed par byed pa nyid de yang rnam pa de lta bu'i thams cad du yod pa 'ba' zhig skyed pa ma yin te de'i ngo bo skyed pa yin no zhes bya ba ma nges pa yin no
analyzed: skad cig ma rnams rang gi rgyu tsam dang 'brel pa nyid skyed par byed pa nyid de yang rnam pa de lta bu'i thams cad du yod pa 'ba' zhig skyed pa ma yin te de'i ngo bo skyed pa yin no zhes bya ba ma nges pa yin no
translated: The momentariness is related to its own cause alone. It is the producer, and it does not produce everything that exists in that way, but only that which has the nature of being produced.

original: snyam du sems na /
analyzed: snyam du sems na /
translated: If you think that is uncertain,

original: 'di dag yongs su spong pa ni bogs 'byin pa nye bar len pa'i lhan cig byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag yongs su spong pa ni bogs 'byin pa nye bar len pa'i lhan cig byed pa ma yin no //
translated: the complete abandonment of these is not the cooperating cause of the enhancement.

original: gang gi phyir de med pas lhan cig byed par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de med pas lhan cig byed par mi 'gyur /
translated: Because it does not exist, it does not act in combination.

original: gang la bogs dbyung ba'i nye bar len pa ni lhan cig byed par yang mi 'gyur thams cad du la lar yang lhan cig 'byung ba phul du byung ba'i nye bar len ba'i mtshan nyid mi srid do //
analyzed: gang la bogs dbyung ba'i nye bar len pa ni lhan cig byed par yang mi 'gyur thams cad du la lar yang lhan cig 'byung ba phul du byung ba'i nye bar len ba'i mtshan nyid mi srid do //
translated: Nor does that which is to be enhanced by it act in combination, because it is impossible that anything should have the characteristic of being enhanced in combination.

original: de lta na lhan cig byed pa ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na lhan cig byed pa ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is it that acts in combination?

original: mang po dag don gcig byed ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: mang po dag don gcig byed ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: It is said: ‚ÄúMany things act for a single purpose.‚Äù

original: 'bras bu gcig sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu gcig sgrub pa'o //
translated: They accomplish a single effect.

original: gang mang po dag la yang srid de rigs pa'i stobs kyis rnam pa de lta bu lhan cig byed ba thams cad la srid pa ni gzhan ma yin no /
analyzed: gang mang po dag la yang srid de rigs pa'i stobs kyis rnam pa de lta bu lhan cig byed ba thams cad la srid pa ni gzhan ma yin no /
translated: This is possible for many things, but it is not possible for all things that act in combination to be like this, by the power of reasoning.

original: 'di dpe ni dper na rgyu'i tshogs pa tha ma lta bu zhes bya ba ni de ma thag tu myu gu'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'di dpe ni dper na rgyu'i tshogs pa tha ma lta bu zhes bya ba ni de ma thag tu myu gu'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: An example is like the final collection of causes, which is the effect of the sprout that immediately follows it.

original: rgyu'i tshogs ba ni rkyen gyi togs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu'i tshogs ba ni rkyen gyi togs pa'o //
translated: The collection of causes is the collection of conditions.

original: 'di dag ni nye bar btags par gyur na lhan cig byed pa 'di dag phul du byung ba bskyed pas dngos po yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'di dag ni nye bar btags par gyur na lhan cig byed pa 'di dag phul du byung ba bskyed pas dngos po yin no zhe na /
translated: If these are imputed as being proximate, then since these co-emergent causes generate the excellent, they are substantial.

original: 'di nyid ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'di nyid ces bya ba smos te /
translated: The response to that is ‚Äúthis itself,‚Äù

original: 'bras bu gcig byed pa i mtshan nyid ni gtso bo yin gyi lhan cig byed pa rnams ni phul du byung ba mi srid bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid nyid mi phal pa yin pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: 'bras bu gcig byed pa i mtshan nyid ni gtso bo yin gyi lhan cig byed pa rnams ni phul du byung ba mi srid bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid nyid mi phal pa yin pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: the characteristic of producing a single effect is primary, but the co-emergent causes are not excellent, because it is not the characteristic of generating the excellent.

original: /'di dag gi lan ni phyis gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: /'di dag gi lan ni phyis gdab par bya'o //
translated: The response to this will be given later.

original: 'di ga las she na /
analyzed: 'di ga las she na /
translated: Why is this?

original: tha ma de nyid ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: tha ma de nyid ces bya ba smos te /
translated: The last line says ‚Äúthat itself.‚Äù

original: brjod par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the cause of the effect that is desired.

original: rgyu ni lhan cig byed par bshad pa ni rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu ni lhan cig byed par bshad pa ni rgyu ma yin te /
translated: The explanation of the cause as co-emergent is not a cause,

original: gang gi phyir car lhan cig byed pa ni lhan cig byed par brjod de /
analyzed: gang gi phyir car lhan cig byed pa ni lhan cig byed par brjod de /
translated: because the simultaneous is called co-emergent.

original: mtha' ma'i rgyu'i tshogs pa'i rnam pa de lta bu yin pa'i phyir dper na tha ma'i don gcig pa'i lhan cig byed pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du snga ma'i tshogs pa las phyi ma phyi ma'i skad cig ma khyad par can tha dad par nges te tha
analyzed: mtha' ma'i rgyu'i tshogs pa'i rnam pa de lta bu yin pa'i phyir dper na tha ma'i don gcig pa'i lhan cig byed pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du snga ma'i tshogs pa las phyi ma phyi ma'i skad cig ma khyad par can tha dad par nges te tha
translated: The cause of the increase and decrease of the effect that performs a single function everywhere is the generation of a specific collection of co-operating causes.

original: ma nyid dper bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma nyid dper bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is said to be the characteristic of the co-operating cause.üîΩIf they perform a single function, when there is a co-operating cause, it generates a specific effect.üîΩHere, the specific effect is the generation of a specific collection of causes.üîΩThe specific collection of causes is the co-operating cause.üîΩIf they perform a single function, when there is a co-operating cause, it generates a specific effect.

original: de'i phyir myu gu @251a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir myu gu @251a * //
translated: This is the characteristic of the co-operating cause.üîΩIf they perform a single function, when there is a co-operating cause, it generates a specific effect.üîΩThis is the characteristic of the co-operating cause.üîΩIf they perform a single function, when there is a co-operating cause, it generates a specific effect.üîΩThis is the characteristic of the co-operating cause.

original: la sogs pa'i 'bras bu thams cad kyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid du ma'i rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: la sogs pa'i 'bras bu thams cad kyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid du ma'i rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If they perform a single function, when there is a co-operating cause, it generates a specific effect.üîΩThis is the characteristic of the co-operating cause.üîΩIf they perform a single function, when there is a co-operating cause, it generates a specific effect.üîΩThis is the characteristic of the co-operating cause.üîΩIf they perform a single function, when there is a co-operating cause, it generates a specific effect.üîΩThis is the characteristic of the co-operating cause.

original: thams cad du don gcig byed pa'i 'bras bu 'phel pa dang 'grib pa'i rgyu ni lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu'i tshogs pa nyid du khyad par du skyed pa yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad du don gcig byed pa'i 'bras bu 'phel pa dang 'grib pa'i rgyu ni lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu'i tshogs pa nyid du khyad par du skyed pa yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: If they perform a single function, when there is a co-operating cause, it generates a specific effect.üîΩThis is the characteristic of the co-operating cause.üîΩIf they perform a single function, when there is a co-operating cause, it generates a specific effect.üîΩThis is the characteristic of the co-operating cause.üîΩIf they perform a single function, when there is a co-operating cause, it generates a specific effect.üîΩThis is the characteristic of the co-operating cause.

original: 'di dag don gcig byed pa yang de la lhan cig byed pa yod na khyad par du skyed pa mtshan nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'di dag don gcig byed pa yang de la lhan cig byed pa yod na khyad par du skyed pa mtshan nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: If they perform a single function, when there is a co-operating cause, it generates a specific effect.

original: skad cig ma de la zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: skad cig ma de la zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: This is the

original: tha ma'i bye brag tu byed par mi nus pa nyid na lhan cig byed pas kyang khyad par du byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tha ma'i bye brag tu byed par mi nus pa nyid na lhan cig byed pas kyang khyad par du byed pa ma yin no //
translated: If it cannot be distinguished even in the final analysis, then it is not distinguished by the cooperating causes either.

original: gang las khyad par du byed par mi nus she na ;
analyzed: gang las khyad par du byed par mi nus she na ;
translated: From what can it not be distinguished?

original: gcig la zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gcig la zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúfrom the one.‚Äù

original: ngo bo nyid gcig la cha shas dbyer med pa de la 'di khyad par du mi byed pa ni char mi byed pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid gcig la cha shas dbyer med pa de la 'di khyad par du mi byed pa ni char mi byed pa'o //
translated: If it has a single nature, without parts that can be distinguished, then it is not distinguished by the cooperating causes.

original: rang gi rgyu las skyes pa 'di lhan cig byed pas khyad par du byed pa'i phyir bye ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi rgyu las skyes pa 'di lhan cig byed pas khyad par du byed pa'i phyir bye ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Since it is produced from its own cause, it is not distinguished by the cooperating causes, and therefore it is not multiple.

original: gal te dbyer med pa la khyad par yod na ci'i phyir mi byed ce na /
analyzed: gal te dbyer med pa la khyad par yod na ci'i phyir mi byed ce na /
translated: If it is not distinguished, why is it not produced?

original: khyad par du 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni ngo bo nyid gzhan 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: khyad par du 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni ngo bo nyid gzhan 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: He says, ‚Äúbecause the characteristic of production is the arising of another nature.‚Äù

original: cha med pa ga la yin ngo bo nyid gzhan rnam par 'jog pa na bdag nyid las gzhan pa'i khyad par yod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: cha med pa ga la yin ngo bo nyid gzhan rnam par 'jog pa na bdag nyid las gzhan pa'i khyad par yod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: How can it be partless? When another nature is posited, there is a distinction from itself.

original: ngo bo gzhan 'byung na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te ;
analyzed: ngo bo gzhan 'byung na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te ;
translated: ‚ÄúIf the nature of the thing is different, etc.‚Äù

original: gang gi tshe dngos po gzhan pa'i mtshan nyid khyad par du 'gyur ba de'i tshe tha ma'i rgyu nyams pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe dngos po gzhan pa'i mtshan nyid khyad par du 'gyur ba de'i tshe tha ma'i rgyu nyams pa yin te /
translated: When the nature of a thing becomes different, then the final cause is impaired.

original: gal te nyes pa ci zhig yod ce na /
analyzed: gal te nyes pa ci zhig yod ce na /
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúWhat is the fault?‚Äù

original: de'i phyir tha ma ma yin pa'i phyir mngon sum gyi rgyur mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir tha ma ma yin pa'i phyir mngon sum gyi rgyur mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then it is replied, ‚ÄúBecause it is not the final cause, it will not be the cause of direct perception.‚Äù

original: de lta bas na gang gi phyir rgyu'i gtso bo ni lhan cig byed pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na gang gi phyir rgyu'i gtso bo ni lhan cig byed pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the principal cause is not the co-operating causes.

original: dngos su khyad par du skyed pa'i phyir don gcig byed pa nyid lhan cig byed pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos su khyad par du skyed pa'i phyir don gcig byed pa nyid lhan cig byed pa yin no //
translated: Because they directly produce a specific effect, they are co-operating causes because they perform the same function.

original: 'o na ni lhan cig byed pa rnams khyad par du skyed pa mi bden na 'bras bu skyed pa'i nus pa de dag mi rigs so zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni lhan cig byed pa rnams khyad par du skyed pa mi bden na 'bras bu skyed pa'i nus pa de dag mi rigs so zhe na /
translated: But if it is not true that the co-operating causes produce a specific effect, then it is not reasonable that they have the ability to produce an effect.

original: de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúBut if they do not produce a specific effect, etc.‚Äù

original: gal te de dag gi ngo bo nyid kyi nus pas skye ba de dang de dag lhan cig byed pa dag gi nus pa las skye bar khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te de dag gi ngo bo nyid kyi nus pas skye ba de dang de dag lhan cig byed pa dag gi nus pa las skye bar khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is accepted that the arising of those things from their own essential capacity is the arising from the capacity of their collective causes.

original: ji srid tha ma'i ngo bo nyid kyi nus pa ni rkyen dang lhan cig tu skad cig ma tsam thogs nas de dag skad cig ma gcig la skyed pa nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji srid tha ma'i ngo bo nyid kyi nus pa ni rkyen dang lhan cig tu skad cig ma tsam thogs nas de dag skad cig ma gcig la skyed pa nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: As long as the final essential capacity of the conditions is delayed for just an instant, the arising of those things in a single moment is certain.

original: des na sngon dang phyi ma tha @251b dad pa'i ngo bo med pa gang gi mjug thogs su 'bras bu 'byung zhing skyed kyi dus gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na sngon dang phyi ma tha @251b dad pa'i ngo bo med pa gang gi mjug thogs su 'bras bu 'byung zhing skyed kyi dus gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since there is no difference between the prior and subsequent states, the effect arises and is produced immediately after the conditions, not at another time.

original: de la ni de rnams la'o //
analyzed: de la ni de rnams la'o //
translated: In that case, they are.

original: rnam pa de lta bu rnams la bya ba gcig pa kho na'i lhan cig byed pa nyid yin gyi khyad bar du skyed pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu rnams la bya ba gcig pa kho na'i lhan cig byed pa nyid yin gyi khyad bar du skyed pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin te /
translated: They are only co-producing factors of a single action, not of a distinctive production.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis nus pa'i dngos po dang phan tshun 'gal bas nus pa las skyed par khas len par rigs pa ma yin no snyam du gzhan dag sems nas /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis nus pa'i dngos po dang phan tshun 'gal bas nus pa las skyed par khas len par rigs pa ma yin no snyam du gzhan dag sems nas /
translated: Since it is contradictory for things to be able to arise from themselves, it is not logical to accept that they arise from their own potency.

original: gal te nus pa de dag gang las zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: gal te nus pa de dag gang las zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Others think this and say, ‚ÄúIf they arise from their own potency, from what do those potencies arise?‚Äù

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas rang gi rgyu dag las zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas rang gi rgyu dag las zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The Proponents of the Tenets of the Middle Way say, ‚ÄúThey arise from their own causes.‚Äù

original: gzhan gyi 'dod pa la ltos nas 'dir ngo bo nyid ces bya ba bshad do //
analyzed: gzhan gyi 'dod pa la ltos nas 'dir ngo bo nyid ces bya ba bshad do //
translated: In dependence on the assertions of others, here we explain that things arise from their own causes.

original: gzhan dag skyed pa la rgyu dang lhan cig pa rnams kyi nus pa 'dod na ni de dgag pa'i phyir gzhan la ngo bo nyid ces brjod kyi ngo bo nyid cung zad cig skyed pa med de /
analyzed: gzhan dag skyed pa la rgyu dang lhan cig pa rnams kyi nus pa 'dod na ni de dgag pa'i phyir gzhan la ngo bo nyid ces brjod kyi ngo bo nyid cung zad cig skyed pa med de /
translated: If others assert that potencies are simultaneous with their causes in the production of other effects, in order to refute that, we say that things arise from other potencies. However, there is not the slightest production of things from other things.

original: de'i rgyu gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rgyu gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it would follow that the cause would be the same as the effect.

original: don gcig byed par nges pa'i skad cig ma ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: don gcig byed par nges pa'i skad cig ma ni mi rigs te /
translated: It is illogical for a moment of consciousness to be certain to perform a single function,

original: mtha' ma'i skad cig ma 'ba' zhig dang 'dra ba mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtha' ma'i skad cig ma 'ba' zhig dang 'dra ba mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is seen that the final moment of consciousness is similar to the other moments of consciousness.

original: 'di ltar 'di lta bu'i ngo bo dang / 'di lta bu'i ngo bo ma yin pa zhes mthong ba dang ma mthong ba dag las rnam par 'byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di lta bu'i ngo bo dang / 'di lta bu'i ngo bo ma yin pa zhes mthong ba dang ma mthong ba dag las rnam par 'byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is distinguished from seeing and not seeing, such as this nature and not this nature.

original: de zhing la sogs pa ci 'dra ba de la rkyen gzhan dang nye ba las nye bar dmigs pas de 'dra ba nyid 'ba' zhig dang yin no //
analyzed: de zhing la sogs pa ci 'dra ba de la rkyen gzhan dang nye ba las nye bar dmigs pas de 'dra ba nyid 'ba' zhig dang yin no //
translated: Since it is observed in that way, it is just like that, due to the proximity of other conditions in the field and so on.

original: de'i phyir de las gzhan pa dang lhan cig pa lta bu 'ba' zhig gi nus pa las kyang myu gu la sogs pa skyed pa ni rang rang gi skad cig ma'i mjug thogs su skye ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de las gzhan pa dang lhan cig pa lta bu 'ba' zhig gi nus pa las kyang myu gu la sogs pa skyed pa ni rang rang gi skad cig ma'i mjug thogs su skye ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the production of sprouts and so on from the capacity of just that, which is like being together with something else, arises in the immediate aftermath of its own moment.

original: 'ba' zhig kyang myu gu la sogs pa skyed pa'i phyir rang bzhin mi skyed pa yin na /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig kyang myu gu la sogs pa skyed pa'i phyir rang bzhin mi skyed pa yin na /
translated: Since even just that produces sprouts and so on, it does not produce its own nature.

original: de'i ngo bo las skyed pa yin no zhes bya ba ma nges pa yin no snyam du bsams nas gzhan gyis gal te de dag gis zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo las skyed pa yin no zhes bya ba ma nges pa yin no snyam du bsams nas gzhan gyis gal te de dag gis zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Thinking that the production from its own nature is uncertain, another says, ‚ÄúIf they produce it,‚Äù and so on.

original: rang gi rgyu ni zhing dang sa bon la sogs pa las gzhan pa'i nus pa las gzhan pa'i rkyen gzhan nye ba kho nas skyed la ci'i phyir 'ba' zhig pas ma yin /
analyzed: rang gi rgyu ni zhing dang sa bon la sogs pa las gzhan pa'i nus pa las gzhan pa'i rkyen gzhan nye ba kho nas skyed la ci'i phyir 'ba' zhig pas ma yin /
translated: The cause of that is generated by the mere presence of other conditions, which are different from the potency that is different from the field, seed, etc. Why is it not generated by the single cause alone?

original: lhan cig byed pa ni thams cad kyi tshe mi srid pa'i phyir ro snyam na /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa ni thams cad kyi tshe mi srid pa'i phyir ro snyam na /
translated: Because it is impossible for the cooperating causes to exist at all times.

original: res 'ga' zhig ni zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: res 'ga' zhig ni zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Sometimes, however,

original: dus 'ga' zhig gi tshe'o //
analyzed: dus 'ga' zhig gi tshe'o //
translated: means at some time.

original: gzhan du yang ni 'ba' zhig pa las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du yang ni 'ba' zhig pa las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Sometimes, it is generated even by the single cause alone.

original: 'di ltar @252a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar @252a * //
translated: Thus,

original: nang gi bdag nyid dang phyi rol du mthong ste la lar 'bras bu ci 'dra ba dang ltan cig pa gang de 'dra ba nyid de spangs pa'i 'ba' zhig pas kyang skyed par 'gyur ba'i nus pa la rkyen ci zhig yod ce na /
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid dang phyi rol du mthong ste la lar 'bras bu ci 'dra ba dang ltan cig pa gang de 'dra ba nyid de spangs pa'i 'ba' zhig pas kyang skyed par 'gyur ba'i nus pa la rkyen ci zhig yod ce na /
translated: it is seen internally and externally. In some cases, the potency to generate the effect that is similar to the cause is seen to be generated by the single cause alone. What condition is there for the potency to generate the effect that is dissimilar to the cause?üîΩTherefore, it is said,

original: des na 'ba' zhig kho na zhes bya ba smos te gcig kyang skyed par byed pa srid pas du ma nyi tshe ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na 'ba' zhig kho na zhes bya ba smos te gcig kyang skyed par byed pa srid pas du ma nyi tshe ni ma yin no //
translated: the single cause alone is capable of generating the effect. It is not only the many that are capable of generating the effect.

original: 'ga' zhig tu yul la sogs pa'i nus pas skyed pa ni zhing dang sa bon la sogs pa 'bras bu skyed pa'o //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig tu yul la sogs pa'i nus pas skyed pa ni zhing dang sa bon la sogs pa 'bras bu skyed pa'o //
translated: In some cases, the power of the object and so on generates the effect, such as a field, seed, and so on generating the sprout.

original: gang gi tshe de'i rang bzhin ni gdon mi za bar skyed pa na 'ba' zhig skyed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe de'i rang bzhin ni gdon mi za bar skyed pa na 'ba' zhig skyed pa ma yin no //
translated: When its nature is definitely generated, it is not generated alone.üîΩEven if its nature is possible, it is not definite that it arises from that.

original: de'i rang bzhin srid na yang de las gzhan dag ma nges pa yin no zhes zer ba'i lan ni 'di yin te gzhan dang gzhan la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te gzhan dang gzhan sbyar nas khur khyer pa'i skyes bu'i 'bad pas sgye la sogs par
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin srid na yang de las gzhan dag ma nges pa yin no zhes zer ba'i lan ni 'di yin te gzhan dang gzhan la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te gzhan dang gzhan sbyar nas khur khyer pa'i skyes bu'i 'bad pas sgye la sogs par
translated: The answer to that is stated: ‚ÄúWhen the power of the other and other‚Ä¶‚Äù When the power of the other and other is applied, such as a person carrying a load applying effort to a sack and so on,

original: bcug na zhing du 'gro ba dang btsugs pa la sogs pa'i rkyen phyis sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni rgyu skad cig ma tha dad pa'i nus pa ni res 'ga' zhig kyang snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus su 'byung ba nus pa gcig pa ma yin no
analyzed: bcug na zhing du 'gro ba dang btsugs pa la sogs pa'i rkyen phyis sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni rgyu skad cig ma tha dad pa'i nus pa ni res 'ga' zhig kyang snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus su 'byung ba nus pa gcig pa ma yin no
translated: and later conditions such as taking it to the field and sowing it are applied, the power of the different moments of the cause is not the same power occurring at an earlier and later time.

original: // gzhan dang gzhan rkyen ldan pa'i mtshan nyid rgyu tha dad pa yang nus pa tha dad pa ni rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: // gzhan dang gzhan rkyen ldan pa'i mtshan nyid rgyu tha dad pa yang nus pa tha dad pa ni rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The characteristic of possessing other conditions is the difference of causes. The difference of potencies would result in causelessness.

original: gzhan yang 'bras la sogs pa'i sa bon gyi nus pa tha dad pa ni rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'bras la sogs pa'i sa bon gyi nus pa tha dad pa ni rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, the difference of potencies of seeds such as rice would result in causelessness.

original: gzhan yang 'bras la sogs pa'i sa bon gyi nus pa tha dad pa'i rgyu tha dad pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir 'du byed pa dang nye bar tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'bras la sogs pa'i sa bon gyi nus pa tha dad pa'i rgyu tha dad pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir 'du byed pa dang nye bar tshogs pa'o //
translated: Moreover, the difference of potencies of seeds such as rice is connected with the difference of causes, and so there is the assemblage of conditions.

original: rkyen gyi byed pa rgyud ma las rgyu 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rkyen gyi byed pa rgyud ma las rgyu 'byung ngo //
translated: The activity of conditions is the arising of the effect from the cause.

original: gal te kha dog dang dbyibs sam gzhan pa mtshungs pa ni med de rnam pa cung zad cig 'dra bas rnam pa gcig tu shes pa skyed pa'i mtshan nyid mtshungs pa'i ngo bo de dag yin pa'i phyir 'dra ba dang mtshungs par rtogs pa ngo shes pa yin
analyzed: gal te kha dog dang dbyibs sam gzhan pa mtshungs pa ni med de rnam pa cung zad cig 'dra bas rnam pa gcig tu shes pa skyed pa'i mtshan nyid mtshungs pa'i ngo bo de dag yin pa'i phyir 'dra ba dang mtshungs par rtogs pa ngo shes pa yin
translated: If there is no difference of color and shape, there is no difference of aspect. Because they are the same in the characteristic of producing a cognition of a single aspect, they are the same in aspect. That is recognition.

original: no // de ltar bcos ma dang ma bcos pa'i nor bu dang mu tig la sogs pa rkyen gzhan dang 'brel pa'i mtshan nyid tshogs pa tha dad pas tha dad pa nyid de /üîΩmi 'dra ba nyid la ngo bo shes pa'i dbang gis tha mi dad pa ni ma yin te /

translated: Thus, the nature of a jewel, pearl, and so on, whether artificial or not, is different due to the difference in the collection of conditions that are related to other conditions.üîΩIt is not that they are not different due to the power of the cognition of their nature.üîΩ

original: sa bon la sogs pa 'di dag gi rang bzhin mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: sa bon la sogs pa 'di dag gi rang bzhin mtshungs pa'o //
translated: Thus, the nature of the seed and so on is similar.üîΩThus, because of the difference in nature, the difference in potency is established by the production of the collection of other and other conditions.üîΩWhatever is produced by a certain collection of conditions is not produced by any other collection.üîΩWhatever is produced by a certain collection of conditions is not produced by any other collection.üîΩWhatever is produced by a certain collection of conditions is not produced by any other collection.

original: / gang cung zad cig zhing dang sa bon la sogs myu gu la sogs pa 'bras bu 'ga' zhig des skyed par nus kyi /
analyzed: / gang cung zad cig zhing dang sa bon la sogs myu gu la sogs pa 'bras bu 'ga' zhig des skyed par nus kyi /
translated: Whatever is produced by a certain collection of conditions is not produced by any other collection.üîΩWhatever is produced by a certain collection of conditions is not produced by any other collection.

original: thams cad kyis thams cad skyed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad kyis thams cad skyed pa ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is produced by a certain collection of conditions is not produced by any other collection.üîΩWhatever is

original: zhing dang sa bon la sogs pa ma tshogs pa la myu gu skyed pa'i rang bzhin nam skad cig ma'i nus pa'i ngo bo med pas de'i rang bzhin skyed pa dang mi skyed pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir 'dir ma nges pa ma yin no //
