translated: Therefore, since the nature of the agent and the nature of the nonagent are contradictory in one basis,üîΩthe agent and the nonagent are different.üîΩThus, the nature of the agent that is the producer of the effect and the nature of the nonagent that is other than the producer of the effect are contradictory in one basis.

original: de lta na de dag gi ngo bo la skyed par byed pa rgyu ni byed pa po gcig gi ngo bo dang skyed par byed pa las gzhan byed pa po ma yin pa'i ngo bo skyed par byed pa de dag kyang chos can gcig pa 'gal bas gzhanüîΩpa nyid de /
analyzed: de lta na de dag gi ngo bo la skyed par byed pa rgyu ni byed pa po gcig gi ngo bo dang skyed par byed pa las gzhan byed pa po ma yin pa'i ngo bo skyed par byed pa de dag kyang chos can gcig pa 'gal bas gzhanüîΩpa nyid de /
translated: Therefore, they are different.

original: byed pa po'i rang bzhin skyed par byed pa'i rgyu las skyes pa'ang byed pa po ma yin te ngo bo gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir gang zhig 'gyur ba de ni de nyid ma yin no zhes thal ba 'dir mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byed pa po'i rang bzhin skyed par byed pa'i rgyu las skyes pa'ang byed pa po ma yin te ngo bo gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir gang zhig 'gyur ba de ni de nyid ma yin no zhes thal ba 'dir mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Also, that which is arisen from a cause that generates the nature of an agent is not an agent, because it is not a different entity.  The absurd consequence that ‚Äúthat which transforms is not that itself‚Äù does not apply here.

original: gzhan yang de lta ma yin pa brtan pa'i ngo bo rnams la don gcig byed par nges par brtags pa'am dngos po nye bar dgod pa ni gang zhig de'i ngo bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //üîΩdngos po ltos nas skyed pa'i chos kyi ngo bo ni thams cad kyi tshe su yang mi brjod kyi lhan cig byed pa nye ba la ltos nas dngos po rnams byed pa por rnam par 'jog na bdag nyid kyis ma yin pa'i phyir rang nyid byed pa po
analyzed: gzhan yang de lta ma yin pa brtan pa'i ngo bo rnams la don gcig byed par nges par brtags pa'am dngos po nye bar dgod pa ni gang zhig de'i ngo bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // dngos po ltos nas skyed pa'i chos kyi ngo bo ni thams cad kyi tshe su yang mi brjod kyi lhan cig byed pa nye ba la ltos nas dngos po rnams byed pa por rnam par 'jog na bdag nyid kyis ma yin pa'i phyir rang nyid byed pa po
translated: Moreover, if that were not so, it would be necessary to investigate whether or not the nature of the stable is ascertained to perform a single function, or whether the nature of the stable is established as a thing.

original: ma yin na gzhan gyi ngo bos byed pa po mi rigs pas byed pa po rgyun chad par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma yin na gzhan gyi ngo bos byed pa po mi rigs pas byed pa po rgyun chad par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The nature of a thing that is arisen in dependence on conditions is not described as anything at all.  If things are posited as agents in dependence on the presence of cooperating conditions, and not by themselves, then since they are not agents by themselves, it is illogical that they are agents by the nature of something else.  Therefore, it follows that the agent is interrupted.

original: rnam pa de lta bu de ni rang gi ngo bos res 'ga' zhig lhan cig byed pa'i 'bras bu la mi ltos so //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu de ni rang gi ngo bos res 'ga' zhig lhan cig byed pa'i 'bras bu la mi ltos so //
translated: Such an entity does not sometimes depend on a simultaneous effect by its own nature.

original: gang gzhan lhan cig pa dang gzhan 'ba' zhig pa ni byed pa po ma yin pa tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gzhan lhan cig pa dang gzhan 'ba' zhig pa ni byed pa po ma yin pa tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: But that which is different from that, whether simultaneous or not, is not the agent.

original: gal te de lta na de thams cad du de'i ngo bo 'bras bu byed pa cis na ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na de thams cad du de'i ngo bo 'bras bu byed pa cis na ma yin zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then why is it not always the case that its nature is the effect?

original: 'bras bu rkyen gzhan la ltos pa'i ngo bo des de la skyed par byed pa nyid du gnas su zin kyang 'ba' zhig pa las mi 'byung ba de 'dir 'bras bu kho na'i skyon yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu rkyen gzhan la ltos pa'i ngo bo des de la skyed par byed pa nyid du gnas su zin kyang 'ba' zhig pa las mi 'byung ba de 'dir 'bras bu kho na'i skyon yin te /
translated: Even though it is established that its nature, which depends on other conditions, is productive of the effect, it does not arise from the mere fact of its existence. This is the fault of the effect itself.

original: gang de la 'ba' zhig skyed par byed par gnas su zin kyang rkyen gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang de la 'ba' zhig skyed par byed par gnas su zin kyang rkyen gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even though it is established that it is productive of the mere fact of its existence, it does not arise because it depends on other conditions.

original: de'i phyir @258b de'i 'bras bu'i bdag nyid lhan cig byed pa rnams kho na las skye bas don gcig byed pa'i mtshan nyid lhan cig byed pa nyid skad cig ma ma yin pa la yang 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir @258b de'i 'bras bu'i bdag nyid lhan cig byed pa rnams kho na las skye bas don gcig byed pa'i mtshan nyid lhan cig byed pa nyid skad cig ma ma yin pa la yang 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Therefore, since it is generated from the coexistent cause that is its result, it is tenable that coexistent cause is the characteristic of performing a single function even in the case of nonmomentary states.

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas snga ma'i skyon las ma 'das par bstan pa ni de lta na yang zhes pa smos te /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas snga ma'i skyon las ma 'das par bstan pa ni de lta na yang zhes pa smos te /
translated: The proponent of tenets says that the previous error is not overcome, stating, ‚ÄúEven so,

original: rgol bas ji ltar de rtag par mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po 'ba' zhig gis skyed pa ni mi thogs par skyed pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yod do zhes brjod pas lhan cig pa nyid las 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgol bas ji ltar de rtag par mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po 'ba' zhig gis skyed pa ni mi thogs par skyed pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yod do zhes brjod pas lhan cig pa nyid las 'gyur te /
translated: the opponent says that since it is said that the nature of a thing that is merely permanent generates without obstruction, it is generated from coexistent causes.

original: tshogs kyi ngo bos skyed pa yin no zhes brjod pa de'i phyir 'ba' zhig pa las ma yin te de'i gnas skabs 'gal ba yin par sngar bshad do ;
analyzed: tshogs kyi ngo bos skyed pa yin no zhes brjod pa de'i phyir 'ba' zhig pa las ma yin te de'i gnas skabs 'gal ba yin par sngar bshad do ;
translated: Since it is said that it is generated by the nature of the assembly, it is not generated from a single cause, because its state is contradictory, as was previously explained.

original: /'di ltar gang la mi thogs par skyed pa'i chos de ni gdon mi za bar 'dis 'bras bu byed pa yin no //
analyzed: /'di ltar gang la mi thogs par skyed pa'i chos de ni gdon mi za bar 'dis 'bras bu byed pa yin no //
translated: Thus, if a phenomenon generates an effect without obstruction, then it is certainly productive of an effect.

original: gdon mi za bar byed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa ji ltar thogs pa med pa'i ngo bo yin /
analyzed: gdon mi za bar byed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa ji ltar thogs pa med pa'i ngo bo yin /
translated: How can something that is not productive by nature be unobstructed?

original: mi thogs pa las 'bras bu mthong bas thogs pa med par skyed pa'i ngo bor khyod du chud par bya'i gzhan du ni ma yin no snyam pa'i gzhan gyis bsams pa'i dogs pa bsu ba ni gal te 'ba' zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: mi thogs pa las 'bras bu mthong bas thogs pa med par skyed pa'i ngo bor khyod du chud par bya'i gzhan du ni ma yin no snyam pa'i gzhan gyis bsams pa'i dogs pa bsu ba ni gal te 'ba' zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The meaning of the phrase ‚Äúwithout obstruction‚Äù is understood to be ‚Äúgenerating an effect without obstruction,‚Äù not something else.

original: kho bo ni 'ba' zhig byed do zhes mi smra ste 'on kyang mi sdod par skyed pa'i ngo bo yin no zhe na /üîΩ'dir dang ni ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: kho bo ni 'ba' zhig byed do zhes mi smra ste 'on kyang mi sdod par skyed pa'i ngo bo yin no zhe na / 'dir dang ni ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúWe do not say that it is productive by itself, but rather it is productive without obstruction,‚ÄùüîΩthen the response to that is, ‚ÄúHow can something that is not productive be productive without obstruction?‚Äù

original: gal te byed pa nyid kyang mi 'dod na ji ltar mi sdod par skyed pa'i ngo bo yin par brjod /
analyzed: gal te byed pa nyid kyang mi 'dod na ji ltar mi sdod par skyed pa'i ngo bo yin par brjod /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúWe do not assert that it is productive,‚Äù then how can you say that it is productive without obstruction?

original: 'on te de ltar yin no zhes smra na /
analyzed: 'on te de ltar yin no zhes smra na /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúIt is like that,‚ÄùüîΩthen how can you say that it is productive without obstruction?

original: de'i tshe 'di skad du brjod pa 'dis yongs su bstan par byas pa ma yin nam ci shig de skyed pa yin snyam na /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di skad du brjod pa 'dis yongs su bstan par byas pa ma yin nam ci shig de skyed pa yin snyam na /
translated: But if you think that it is not indicated by this statement, what is it that generates it?

original: de nyid mi sdod par skyed pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de nyid mi sdod par skyed pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: It is the nature of that which generates without abiding.

original: gang dang gang skyed pa yin pa de gdon mi za bar skyed pa'i ngo bor de ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gang dang gang skyed pa yin pa de gdon mi za bar skyed pa'i ngo bor de ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: How could it be that which generates that which is generated, if it is not the nature of that which generates?

original: gang 'bras bu 'di nyid gzhan la rag las pas skyed pa byed par gnas pa de yang rkyen gzhan la rag las pa yin no zhes bya ba de ni rigs kyi /
analyzed: gang 'bras bu 'di nyid gzhan la rag las pas skyed pa byed par gnas pa de yang rkyen gzhan la rag las pa yin no zhes bya ba de ni rigs kyi /
translated: It is reasonable to say that that which generates this effect, which is dependent on another, is also dependent on another condition.üîΩBut why does an effect, even though it is a mere existent that is not momentary, remain indifferent to other conditions, even though it has the ability to generate?üîΩIt is not independent.

original: gang gi phyir 'bras bu yang skad cig ma med pa'i dngos po 'ba' zhig pas nus pa yod kyang rkyen gzhan la ltos nas ji ltar btang snyoms su 'dug / mi ltos pa ma yin na yang ci zhig byed /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'bras bu yang skad cig ma med pa'i dngos po 'ba' zhig pas nus pa yod kyang rkyen gzhan la ltos nas ji ltar btang snyoms su 'dug / mi ltos pa ma yin na yang ci zhig byed /
translated: But what is the use of that?

original: gzhan la zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gzhan la zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said:

original: rkyen gzhan la mi 'chol bar ni ma spangs par bya'o //
analyzed: rkyen gzhan la mi 'chol bar ni ma spangs par bya'o //
translated: It should not be abandoned without relying on another condition.

original: de'i 'bras bu'i stobs kyis skyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu'i stobs kyis skyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: It will be generated by the power of its effect.

original: gal te de ltar yin na yod tan ci zhig yod ce na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na yod tan ci zhig yod ce na /
translated: If that is so, what is the advantage?

original: de lta na zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de lta na zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúIn that case,‚Äù

original: @259a * // gzhan la mi 'chol bar stobs kyis rang gi 'bras bu skyed pa 'dis 'ba' zhig pa la yang nus pa yod pa gang yin pa de ni bdag nyid 'ba' zhig gis kyang de nus par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: @259a * // gzhan la mi 'chol bar stobs kyis rang gi 'bras bu skyed pa 'dis 'ba' zhig pa la yang nus pa yod pa gang yin pa de ni bdag nyid 'ba' zhig gis kyang de nus par bstan pa yin no //
translated: that is, in the case of the power to generate its effect without relying on other conditions, the fact that it alone has the ability to do so demonstrates that it alone has the power to do so.üîΩOtherwise, if it generates its effect only in dependence on other conditions, since it never generates its effect alone, it would be thought that it alone lacks the ability to do so.

original: de lta ma yin na lhan cig byed pa kho na byed pas 'ba' zhig pas kyang res 'ga' zhig kyang mi byed pas 'ba' zhig pa 'dis nus pa ma yin no zhes gzhan dag gi blor 'gyur na de las 'di spangs nas skye ba lta bu'i ji ltarüîΩrjes su 'brang /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na lhan cig byed pa kho na byed pas 'ba' zhig pas kyang res 'ga' zhig kyang mi byed pas 'ba' zhig pa 'dis nus pa ma yin no zhes gzhan dag gi blor 'gyur na de las 'di spangs nas skye ba lta bu'i ji ltar rjes su 'brang /
translated: How could it be like the arising of this from that, which is not followed by that?

original: de'i phyir 'bras bu rkyen gzhan la ltos pa yin no zhes bya ba ni mi rigs par brjod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'bras bu rkyen gzhan la ltos pa yin no zhes bya ba ni mi rigs par brjod do //
translated: Therefore, it is illogical to say that the effect depends on other conditions.

original: 'bras bu gzhan la ltos pa 'gal ba de'i gnas skabs bstan pa ni 'bras bu gzhan la ltos nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'bras bu gzhan la ltos pa 'gal ba de'i gnas skabs bstan pa ni 'bras bu gzhan la ltos nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The explanation of the contradiction of a result relying on another is stated in ‚ÄúIf a result relied on another . . . ‚Äù

original: 'bras bu gzhan la ltos par brjod pa 'ba' zhig pa'i rgyus mi skyed do zhes gdon mi za bar smras pa yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu gzhan la ltos par brjod pa 'ba' zhig pa'i rgyus mi skyed do zhes gdon mi za bar smras pa yin no //
translated: It is definitely said that a cause that is only said to rely on another result does not generate it.

original: 'ba' zhig pa nges kyang nus pa'i phyir 'ba' zhig pa de las khyed 'bras bu skyed pa yin la /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig pa nges kyang nus pa'i phyir 'ba' zhig pa de las khyed 'bras bu skyed pa yin la /
translated: Even if it is only, it is able to generate it, and therefore it is only that which generates the result.

original: 'dis kyang gcig kho na'i 'bras bu yin pa de'i phyir gcig la skyed pa dang mi skyed pa phan tshun 'gal pas ji ltar 'bras bu gcig par bshad /
analyzed: 'dis kyang gcig kho na'i 'bras bu yin pa de'i phyir gcig la skyed pa dang mi skyed pa phan tshun 'gal pas ji ltar 'bras bu gcig par bshad /
translated: And since it is the result of only that, how could it be explained as a single result, since it is contradictory for it to both generate and not generate only that?

original: chos can de la chos 'gal ba gnas pa ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir gcig par brjod pa na ma yang yin la mo gsham yang yin no zhes brjod pa 'di dag 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i sngar bshad pa'i skyon de las mi 'grol lo //
analyzed: chos can de la chos 'gal ba gnas pa ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir gcig par brjod pa na ma yang yin la mo gsham yang yin no zhes brjod pa 'di dag 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i sngar bshad pa'i skyon de las mi 'grol lo //
translated: Since the contradiction of a phenomenon that is a basis of a contradictory phenomenon is a different characteristic, when it is said to be one, it is like saying ‚ÄúShe is a mother and also a barren woman.‚Äù One is not freed from the previously explained error.

original: gang gi phyir 'di ltar brjod pa na 'gal bar brjod pas mi rtogs pa de lta bas na skad cig ma med par brjod pas skad cig ma'i phyogs la gnod pa med pas de'i rtsod pa rnams rdzogs par bstan to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di ltar brjod pa na 'gal bar brjod pas mi rtogs pa de lta bas na skad cig ma med par brjod pas skad cig ma'i phyogs la gnod pa med pas de'i rtsod pa rnams rdzogs par bstan to //
translated: Since it is thus, when one speaks in contradiction, one does not understand. Therefore, since there is no harm to the position of momentariness by the statement of non-momentariness, the dispute is completely resolved.

original: mi bzod pa'i mtshan nyid ni phrag dog go //
analyzed: mi bzod pa'i mtshan nyid ni phrag dog go //
translated: The characteristic of intolerance is envy.

original: zug rdu ni sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zug rdu ni sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The dart is the cause of suffering.

original: des na gnad du bsnun pa nad kyis zug pa'o //
analyzed: des na gnad du bsnun pa nad kyis zug pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the one who is struck at the vital point is the one who is struck by disease.

original: phrag dog gi zug rngus gnad du bsnun pas mchog tu yid mi bde ba can 'di 'gal bar brjod pas mi rtogs pa ni 'chal ba ste /
analyzed: phrag dog gi zug rngus gnad du bsnun pas mchog tu yid mi bde ba can 'di 'gal bar brjod pas mi rtogs pa ni 'chal ba ste /
translated: Since the dart of envy strikes at the vital point, the one who has supreme mental dissatisfaction is the one who does not understand through speaking in contradiction.

original: snga ma dang phyi ma mi 'brel pas 'chol pa'o //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma mi 'brel pas 'chol pa'o //
translated: Since the former and latter are not connected, there is confusion.

original: 'khang bas 'gal bar byed pa'i phyir sems ni bde zhing bskyed par 'dod pa mi gus pas de'i skyon brjod pa na myur du sdug bsngal bskyed pas rma lab tsha btab pa dang mtshungs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'khang bas 'gal bar byed pa'i phyir sems ni bde zhing bskyed par 'dod pa mi gus pas de'i skyon brjod pa na myur du sdug bsngal bskyed pas rma lab tsha btab pa dang mtshungs pa'i phyir /
translated: Since the mind is disturbed by the dart of envy, the one who wishes to generate a happy mind is the one who is disrespectful. Since the one who speaks of the faults of the other quickly generates suffering, it is similar to the application of salt to a wound.

original: mkhas pa blo dang ldan pas btang snyoms su bya bar 'os so //üîΩde nyid skad cig @259b ma med pa rnams la rnam pa 'ga' zhig don byed pas nges pa'i mtshan nyid kyi lhan cig byed pa nyid srid pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i mjug bsdu ba ni de lta bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos teüîΩ/ gang dag brtan pa'i ngo bo so sor yod pa srid pa de dag skad cig med pa rnams so sor 'ba' zhig pas 'bras bu skyed pa srid pas lhan cig mi byed pa'i phyir lhan cig byed pas nges pa mi rigs so //
analyzed: mkhas pa blo dang ldan pas btang snyoms su bya bar 'os so // de nyid skad cig @259b ma med pa rnams la rnam pa 'ga' zhig don byed pas nges pa'i mtshan nyid kyi lhan cig byed pa nyid srid pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i mjug bsdu ba ni de lta bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / gang dag brtan pa'i ngo bo so sor yod pa srid pa de dag skad cig med pa rnams so sor 'ba' zhig pas 'bras bu skyed pa srid pas lhan cig mi byed pa'i phyir lhan cig byed pas nges pa mi rigs so //
translated: The wise and intelligent should be indifferent to it.üîΩThe summary of the demonstration that it is impossible for the defining characteristic of a cause to be a cause that is a simultaneous activity is stated in the line ‚ÄúTherefore, the cause is not a simultaneous activity.‚ÄùüîΩSince it is impossible for those that exist as individual, enduring entities to be momentary, it is impossible for them to be simultaneous activities because they are not able to produce an effect individually.

original: don gcig byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi lhan cig byed pa nyid 'di skad cig ma rnams kho na la de dag rang gi rgyu yongs su gyur pa dang nye ba'i chos phan tshun nye bar len pa dang lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen tshogs pa gcig pa skyed pa
analyzed: don gcig byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi lhan cig byed pa nyid 'di skad cig ma rnams kho na la de dag rang gi rgyu yongs su gyur pa dang nye ba'i chos phan tshun nye bar len pa dang lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen tshogs pa gcig pa skyed pa
translated: This characteristic of simultaneous activity, which is the performance of a single object, is possible only for momentary entities. They are produced by their own causes, which are the immediately preceding conditions, and they are produced by the collection of the cooperative conditions.

original: tha dad pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is possible that they are different.

original: 'o na ni phul du byung ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyang lhan cig byed pa nyid las 'byung bar mthong ba'i phyir de ji ltar thams cad phul du byung bskyed pa'i lhan cig byed pa ma yin no zhes sngar bshad pa yin /
analyzed: 'o na ni phul du byung ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyang lhan cig byed pa nyid las 'byung bar mthong ba'i phyir de ji ltar thams cad phul du byung bskyed pa'i lhan cig byed pa ma yin no zhes sngar bshad pa yin /
translated: If that is so, then since it is seen that the characteristic of generating the best is also derived from co-arising, how could it be explained that all are not co-arising that generate the best?

original: de lta na mang po rnams don gcig byed pa ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na mang po rnams don gcig byed pa ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: If that is so, how is it that many perform a single function?üîΩTherefore it is said:

original: des na / gang du rgyun du phan 'dogs pas //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: des na / gang du rgyun du phan 'dogs pas // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Since they always benefit,

original: don gcig byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi lhan cig byed pa nyid thams cad du phul du byung ba skyed pa ni mi srid de gang la rkyen gyis phan 'dogs pa snga ma snga ma'i rkyen rnams las skad cig ma phyi ma phyi ma'i khyad par can dang khyad
analyzed: don gcig byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi lhan cig byed pa nyid thams cad du phul du byung ba skyed pa ni mi srid de gang la rkyen gyis phan 'dogs pa snga ma snga ma'i rkyen rnams las skad cig ma phyi ma phyi ma'i khyad par can dang khyad
translated: The characteristic of co-arising that performs a single function is not possible in all cases, since the later moments of a continuum that are distinguished by the special qualities of the earlier conditions are generated from the earlier conditions that benefit them.

original: par can du skyed pa yod de lhan cig byed par brjod par 'dod pa 'bras bu'i rgyu yin par bstan te /
analyzed: par can du skyed pa yod de lhan cig byed par brjod par 'dod pa 'bras bu'i rgyu yin par bstan te /
translated: The cause of the result is taught to be the coemergent cause.

original: dper na 'bras thug po che la sogs pa las 'bras chan la sogs pa dang / me dang chu dang sa bon la sogs pa las myu gu la sogs pa skyed pa'i sa la sogs pa de la khyad par du skyed pa'i rkyen rnams lhan cig byed par 'jig rten pa brjod pa ni rgyun la brten nas snga ma snga ma'i skad cig ma
analyzed: dper na 'bras thug po che la sogs pa las 'bras chan la sogs pa dang / me dang chu dang sa bon la sogs pa las myu gu la sogs pa skyed pa'i sa la sogs pa de la khyad par du skyed pa'i rkyen rnams lhan cig byed par 'jig rten pa brjod pa ni rgyun la brten nas snga ma snga ma'i skad cig ma
translated: For example, the world asserts that the conditions that generate a specific result, such as rice porridge from rice and so on, or a sprout from fire, water, a seed and so on, are coemergent causes.üîΩThe specific characteristics of the second moment and so on are explained to be the result of the continuum of the prior moment.

original: rnams las gnyis pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid dang rgyun gyi 'bras bu mtshan nyid du bshad pa la brten nas snga ma dang phyi ma'i skad cig ma dag cig tu mngon par zhen nas de nyid 'di yin zhes khyad par du 'byung ngo zhes
analyzed: rnams las gnyis pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid dang rgyun gyi 'bras bu mtshan nyid du bshad pa la brten nas snga ma dang phyi ma'i skad cig ma dag cig tu mngon par zhen nas de nyid 'di yin zhes khyad par du 'byung ngo zhes
translated: Based on that, one conceives of the prior and later moments as one and asserts that they are specifically generated.

original: bya ba'i rdzas la brten nas ma yin te dngos po la brten pa btags pa yin pa des na don dam pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bya ba'i rdzas la brten nas ma yin te dngos po la brten pa btags pa yin pa des na don dam pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not based on the substance of action, because it is a designation based on things. Therefore, it is not ultimate.

original: snga ma dang snga ma'i rang gi rgyu yongs su gyur pa dang nye ba'i chos rnams las phyi ma phyi ma khyad par can du skyed de rgyu'i tshogs pa snga ma'i don gcig byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni @260a * //
analyzed: snga ma dang snga ma'i rang gi rgyu yongs su gyur pa dang nye ba'i chos rnams las phyi ma phyi ma khyad par can du skyed de rgyu'i tshogs pa snga ma'i don gcig byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni @260a * //
translated: From the preceding and preceding phenomena that are transformations of their own causes, the subsequent and subsequent special [phenomena] are produced. The definition of the preceding collection of causes performing a single purpose

original: don dam par na lhan cig byed pa nyid kyis yin no zhes bya ba de la cung zad cig kyang nyams pa med do //
analyzed: don dam par na lhan cig byed pa nyid kyis yin no zhes bya ba de la cung zad cig kyang nyams pa med do //
translated: is ultimate, by co-operation. Nothing is lost in that explanation.

original: ci'i phyir rdzas la brten nas khyad par du 'byung ba skyed par mi 'dod ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rdzas la brten nas khyad par du 'byung ba skyed par mi 'dod ce na /
translated: Why is it not accepted that special production is based on substance?

original: skad cig ma'i rdzas la khyad par las byung pa skyed pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de ni de ma thag pa'i dngos po skad cig ma'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig ma'i rdzas la khyad par las byung pa skyed pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de ni de ma thag pa'i dngos po skad cig ma'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no production of special [phenomena] from momentary substances. That is the nature of the immediately preceding entity, which is momentary.

original: gal te de lta na 'bras thug po che la sogs pa'i rdzas skad cig ma la khyad par du mi skyo'o //
analyzed: gal te de lta na 'bras thug po che la sogs pa'i rdzas skad cig ma la khyad par du mi skyo'o //
translated: If that is so, then the substance of the result, such as cooked rice, would not be produced in a moment.

original: de ma thag pa las kyang 'dir mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir ji lta pa'i phan tshun khyad par can du sgrub pa yang skad cig ma dang lhan cig pa kho nas byed kyi skad cig ma ma yin pa 'ba' zhig pa las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ma thag pa las kyang 'dir mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir ji lta pa'i phan tshun khyad par can du sgrub pa yang skad cig ma dang lhan cig pa kho nas byed kyi skad cig ma ma yin pa 'ba' zhig pa las ni ma yin no //
translated: And it would not be so by the immediately preceding condition. Therefore, the establishment of mutual difference is also done only by the simultaneous moment, not by the non-moment alone.

original: des na de dag don gcig byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni lhan cig byed pa las 'byung ngo //
analyzed: des na de dag don gcig byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni lhan cig byed pa las 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus, the characteristic of performing a single purpose arises from the cooperative cause.

original: gang dang gang sngar byed pa po ma yin pa de ni phyis kyang ma yin no zhes brjod par mi nus so //
analyzed: gang dang gang sngar byed pa po ma yin pa de ni phyis kyang ma yin no zhes brjod par mi nus so //
translated: It cannot be said that whatever was not the agent before will not be the agent later.

original: de lta ni snang ba las mun khung du zhugs pa'i dbang pos don rtogs par mi byed pa mang phyis nas byed pa mthong ngo //
analyzed: de lta ni snang ba las mun khung du zhugs pa'i dbang pos don rtogs par mi byed pa mang phyis nas byed pa mthong ngo //
translated: Thus, it is seen that the sense faculty of one who enters a dark room from a bright place does not initially cognize the object, but later it does.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: khyim la sogs pa'i nang rnams su //
analyzed: khyim la sogs pa'i nang rnams su //
translated: In the interior of houses and so on,

original: snang ba la ni zhugs tsam gyis //
analyzed: snang ba la ni zhugs tsam gyis //
translated: by merely entering the bright light,

original: dbang pos bzung yang ma yin na //üîΩdon snang ba ni med par 'gyur //
analyzed: dbang pos bzung yang ma yin na // don snang ba ni med par 'gyur //
translated: If it is not apprehended by the sense faculties,

original: zhes bshad do zhe na /
analyzed: zhes bshad do zhe na /
translated: then the appearance of objects would not exist.

original: de'i phyir 'bras thug po che la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'bras thug po che la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúIf it is like cooked rice, etc.,‚Äù and so on.

original: nye ba dang mi nye ba yang mtshungs pa'i phyir khyad par du mi skyed de /
analyzed: nye ba dang mi nye ba yang mtshungs pa'i phyir khyad par du mi skyed de /
translated: Since the sense faculties are similar in being either near or far, they do not generate a difference.

original: me la sogs pa yod kyang thug po che la sogs pa las 'bras chan la sogs pa mi bskyed pa'am /
analyzed: me la sogs pa yod kyang thug po che la sogs pa las 'bras chan la sogs pa mi bskyed pa'am /
translated: Even though fire, etc., exists, cooked rice, etc., is not generated from raw rice, etc.

original: de bzhin du snang ba nas mun khung du zhugs pa'i dbang po la rang gis phan pa las rim gyis khyad par du byung bar ma bstan na de'i tshe snga ma bzhin du phyi nas kyang don rtog pa bskyed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du snang ba nas mun khung du zhugs pa'i dbang po la rang gis phan pa las rim gyis khyad par du byung bar ma bstan na de'i tshe snga ma bzhin du phyi nas kyang don rtog pa bskyed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Or, in the same way, if it is not shown that the sense faculties that enter darkness from light gradually generate a difference in their own benefit, then, as before, the conception of objects will not be generated later.

original: de'i phyir 'bras bu srid pa gang la mthong ba gang yin pa de ni de'am gzhan pa 'bras kyis bon la sogs pa gso ma'i sa bon la sogs pa dang khyad par du 'byung ba med pa las gzhan pa nyid khyad par du 'byung bas de'i 'bras buüîΩbyed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'bras bu srid pa gang la mthong ba gang yin pa de ni de'am gzhan pa 'bras kyis bon la sogs pa gso ma'i sa bon la sogs pa dang khyad par du 'byung ba med pa las gzhan pa nyid khyad par du 'byung bas de'i 'bras bu byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The characteristic of the activity of the universal cause is the activity of the effect through the mere presence of that which is not obstructed.üîΩThe characteristic of the activity of the co-existent cause is the activity of the effect through the simultaneous activity of that which is not obstructed.üîΩThe characteristic of the activity of the pervasive cause is the activity of the effect through the mere presence of that which is not obstructed.üîΩThe characteristic of the activity of the ripening cause is the activity of the effect through the activity of that which is not obstructed.üîΩThe characteristic of the activity of the dominant cause is the activity of the effect through the activity of that which is not obstructed.üîΩThe characteristic of the activity of the homogeneous cause is the activity of the effect through the simultaneous activity of that which is not obstructed.üîΩThe characteristic of the activity of the co-existent cause is the activity of the effect through the simultaneous activity of that which is not obstructed.üîΩThe characteristic of the activity of the pervasive cause is the activity of the effect through the mere presence of that which is not obstructed.

original: re zhig de ltar na gang la lhan cig byed pa las 'bras bur 'gyur ba de la phul du 'gyur par bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid du rtag pa dang lhan cig byed pas don gcig byed pa'i mtshan nyid la yang yongs su bstan to //
analyzed: re zhig de ltar na gang la lhan cig byed pa las 'bras bur 'gyur ba de la phul du 'gyur par bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid du rtag pa dang lhan cig byed pas don gcig byed pa'i mtshan nyid la yang yongs su bstan to //
translated: The characteristic of the activity of the ripening cause is the activity of the effect through the activity of that which is not obstructed.üîΩThe characteristic of the activity of the dominant cause is the activity of the effect through the activity of that which is not obstructed.üîΩThe characteristic of the activity of the homogeneous cause is the activity of the effect through the simultaneous activity of that which is not obstructed.

original: gang la nye pa tsam gyis mi thogs par lhan cig @260b byed pas 'bras bu byed pa yin no //üîΩ'on te de yang rgyun la bstan nas phul du byung ba'i mtshan nyid yod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang la nye pa tsam gyis mi thogs par lhan cig @260b byed pas 'bras bu byed pa yin no // 'on te de yang rgyun la bstan nas phul du byung ba'i mtshan nyid yod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: The characteristic of the activity of the co-existent cause is the activity of the effect through the simultaneous activity of that which is not obstructed.üîΩThe characteristic of the activity of the pervasive cause is the activity of the effect through the mere presence of that which is not obstructed.

original: gang gi phyir thogs pa med par skyed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir thogs pa med par skyed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The characteristic of the activity of the ripening cause is the activity of the effect through the activity of that which is not obstructed.üîΩThe characteristic of the activity of the dominant cause is the activity of the effect through the activity of that which is not obstructed.üîΩThe characteristic of the activity

original: gang bar du chod pa med pa la sogs pa'i yul la dbang po la sogs pa rang gi rgyu las skye ba de rnams la dus mi ring bar byed pa khyad par du skyed pa med de phan tshun 'byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang bar du chod pa med pa la sogs pa'i yul la dbang po la sogs pa rang gi rgyu las skye ba de rnams la dus mi ring bar byed pa khyad par du skyed pa med de phan tshun 'byung ba ma yin te /
translated: The sense faculties and so on that arise from their own causes in a field that is not obstructed and so on do not generate a special action that is not distant in time. They do not arise from each other.

original: skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir zhes sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir zhes sngar bshad zin to //
translated: As was previously explained, they are momentary.

original: gal te khyad par du mi skyed pa de'i tshe ji ltar khyad par med pa'i shes pa rgyu las 'byung ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te khyad par du mi skyed pa de'i tshe ji ltar khyad par med pa'i shes pa rgyu las 'byung ba yin zhe na /
translated: If they do not generate a special action, then how can a cognition that is not special arise from a cause?

original: gang gi phyir de la zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de la zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Because of that, it is said.

original: bdag nyid ji lta ba'i gang dang gang gi bdag nyid kyi rkyen yod pa phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba bar du mchod pa'i yul la sogs pa'i rten du gyur pa gang skyed par rung ba 'di shin tu nye ba dang shin tu bskal ba spangs pa'i yul
analyzed: bdag nyid ji lta ba'i gang dang gang gi bdag nyid kyi rkyen yod pa phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba bar du mchod pa'i yul la sogs pa'i rten du gyur pa gang skyed par rung ba 'di shin tu nye ba dang shin tu bskal ba spangs pa'i yul
translated: Whatever conditions exist in whatever way, they mutually approach and become the basis of a field that is not obstructed and so on. Whatever is suitable to generate is very close and is a field that is not distant.

original: la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni bar du ma chod pa'i yul la sogs pa de la gnas pa can gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni bar du ma chod pa'i yul la sogs pa de la gnas pa can gang yin pa'o //
translated: and so on, that is to say, the object that is not obstructed, and so on.

original: de dag lhan cig pa'i ngo bor grub pa dang ngo bo ma yin pa las grub pa tha dad do zhes shes pa'i rgyu byed pa nyid du de rtogs na /
analyzed: de dag lhan cig pa'i ngo bor grub pa dang ngo bo ma yin pa las grub pa tha dad do zhes shes pa'i rgyu byed pa nyid du de rtogs na /
translated: When one understands that they are the cause of the cognition that distinguishes that which is established as having a nature that is simultaneous and that which is established as not having a nature,

original: de la cis na phan tshun khyad par du skyed pa don du nye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de la cis na phan tshun khyad par du skyed pa don du nye bar 'gyur /
translated: why would they be useful for the mutual production of a distinction?

original: gal te rang gi rgyu rnams kho na phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba la sogs pa la rten pa rnams rang gi 'bras bu skyed par rung ba'i yul la sogs pa na gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ni khyad par du sbyor zhing skyed par mi 'gyur na phan tshun
analyzed: gal te rang gi rgyu rnams kho na phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba la sogs pa la rten pa rnams rang gi 'bras bu skyed par rung ba'i yul la sogs pa na gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ni khyad par du sbyor zhing skyed par mi 'gyur na phan tshun
translated: If the causes themselves, which are dependent on the mere mutual approach, and so on, are not suitable for producing their own effect, then the object, and so on, that is characterized by abiding would not be connected with the distinction and would not be produced.

original: khyad par skyed pa de dang 'di dag don du gnyer bar byed na /
analyzed: khyad par skyed pa de dang 'di dag don du gnyer bar byed na /
translated: If one seeks the production of a mutual distinction in that,

original: rag gi rgyu kho na las rnam pa de lta bu skyed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rag gi rgyu kho na las rnam pa de lta bu skyed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: then it is not the cause itself that produces it in that way.

original: gang gi phyir de lta bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
translated: Because of that, therefore,

original: dbang po la sogs pa thogs pa med par gnas pa don gcig byed pa kho na gtso bo yin la lhan cig byed pa nyid rgyun la brten nas rnam par gzhag pa ni ma yin te khyad par du 'byung ba skyed pa ni phal pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa thogs pa med par gnas pa don gcig byed pa kho na gtso bo yin la lhan cig byed pa nyid rgyun la brten nas rnam par gzhag pa ni ma yin te khyad par du 'byung ba skyed pa ni phal pa zhes bya'o //
translated: the primary factor is only the faculties, etc. that are unimpeded and perform a single function, but the state of being a co-originating factor is not established in dependence on a continuum. That which produces a special arising is called ordinary.üîΩBut if the state of being a co-originating factor is not established in dependence on a special arising, how is it known?

original: 'on te khyad par du skyes pa'i mtshan nyid la lhan cig byed pa nyid ji ltar rnam par mi gzhag / de yang 'jig rten la grags pa'i phyir rnam par gzhan par bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te khyad par du skyes pa'i mtshan nyid la lhan cig byed pa nyid ji ltar rnam par mi gzhag / de yang 'jig rten la grags pa'i phyir rnam par gzhan par bya'o zhe na /
translated: Since that is also known in the world, it should be established.

original: de'i phyir gang la zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang la zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it is said, ‚Äúthat which is recognized as a co-originating condition in the world,‚Äù

original: 'bras bu bar du ma chod pa las sogs pa'i yul dang nye ba tsam gyis dbang po la sogs pa lta bu lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen du der rtogs so //
analyzed: 'bras bu bar du ma chod pa las sogs pa'i yul dang nye ba tsam gyis dbang po la sogs pa lta bu lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen du der rtogs so //
translated: because the faculties, etc. are recognized as co-originating conditions in the world, merely through proximity to an object that is not obstructed, such as the result.

original: 'o na kyang @261a * //
analyzed: 'o na kyang @261a * //
translated: But if that is so,

original: brjod par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu skyed par nus pa'i skad cig ma re re so sor phye nas khyad par du byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu skyed par nus pa'i skad cig ma re re so sor phye nas khyad par du byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The continuum of the cause that produces the effect that is desired to be produced is not distinguished by the individual moments that are capable of producing the effect.üîΩThe continuum of the cause that produces the effect that is desired to be produced is not distinguished by the individual moments that are capable of producing the effect.üîΩThe continuum of the cause that produces the effect that is desired to be produced is not distinguished by the individual moments that are capable of producing the effect.üîΩThe continuum of the cause that produces the effect that is desired to be produced is not distinguished by the individual moments that are capable of producing the effect.üîΩThe continuum of the cause that produces the effect that is desired to be produced is not distinguished by the individual moments that are capable of producing the effect.üîΩThe continuum of the cause that produces the effect that is desired to be produced is not distinguished by the individual moments that are capable of producing the effect.üîΩThe continuum of the cause that produces the effect that is desired to be produced is not distinguished by the individual moments that are capable of producing the effect.

original: de la dus ring po nas 'byung ba'i 'bras bu byed pa'i rgyu'i rgyun skad cig ma gzhan dang gzhan du yod pa'i mtshan nyid yul du byung ba'i bdag nyid skyed pa'i phyir lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen gzhan la ltos pa yin gyi de'i dus mtshungs pa'i skad cigüîΩma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la dus ring po nas 'byung ba'i 'bras bu byed pa'i rgyu'i rgyun skad cig ma gzhan dang gzhan du yod pa'i mtshan nyid yul du byung ba'i bdag nyid skyed pa'i phyir lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen gzhan la ltos pa yin gyi de'i dus mtshungs pa'i skad cig ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The continuum of the cause that produces the effect that is desired to be produced is not distinguished by the individual moments that are capable of producing the effect.üîΩThe continuum of the cause that produces the effect that is desired to be produced is not distinguished by the individual moments that are capable of producing the effect.üîΩThe continuum of the cause that produces the effect that is desired to be produced is not distinguished by the individual moments that are capable of producing the effect.üîΩThe continuum of the cause that produces the effect that is desired to be produced is not distinguished by the individual moments that are capable of producing the effect.üîΩThe continuum of the cause that produces the effect that is desired to be produced is not distinguished by the individual moments that are capable of producing the effect.üîΩThe continuum of the cause that produces the effect that is desired to be produced is not distinguished by the individual moments that are capable of producing the effect.üîΩThe continuum of the cause that produces the effect that is desired to be produced is not distinguished by the individual moments that are capable of producing the effect.üîΩThe continuum of the cause that produces the effect that is desired to be produced is not distinguished by the individual moments that are capable of producing the effect.

original: de'i phyir rkyen gzhan pa de dag las ngo bo nyid gzhan pa'i 'bras bu skyed par nus pa khyad par can brgyud pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa'i rgyun la 'jig rten gcig pa nyid du brjod par mos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir rkyen gzhan pa de dag las ngo bo nyid gzhan pa'i 'bras bu skyed par nus pa khyad par can brgyud pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa'i rgyun la 'jig rten gcig pa nyid du brjod par mos so //
translated: The continuum of the cause that produces the effect that is desired to be produced is not distinguished by the individual moments that are capable of producing the effect.üîΩThe continuum of the cause that produces the effect that is desired to be produced is

original: don dam par na de la yang snga ma snga ma'i tshogs pa la phyi ma phyi ma'i 'bras bu skyed par nus pa khyad par can gyi mtshan nyid skad cig ma so sor nges so zhes bya ba'i don gcig byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni lhan cig byed paüîΩnyid ni rjes su 'byung ngo //
analyzed: don dam par na de la yang snga ma snga ma'i tshogs pa la phyi ma phyi ma'i 'bras bu skyed par nus pa khyad par can gyi mtshan nyid skad cig ma so sor nges so zhes bya ba'i don gcig byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni lhan cig byed pa nyid ni rjes su 'byung ngo //
translated: The characteristic of performing a function is the characteristic of the cooperating cause.

original: ji ltar ngo bo gzhan thob pa de dag kyang gang gis na rim gyis 'bras bu ldog par byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar ngo bo gzhan thob pa de dag kyang gang gis na rim gyis 'bras bu ldog par byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that they obtain a different nature and then gradually cease to generate the effect?

original: gang gi phyir rang gi ngang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /üîΩde la ni de ni'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rang gi ngang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / de la ni de ni'o //
translated: The root text states, ‚Äúbecause of their intrinsic nature‚Äù and so on.

original: rgyu ni rgyun gyi rgyu ste nye bar len pa'i rgyur bshad pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu ni rgyun gyi rgyu ste nye bar len pa'i rgyur bshad pa'o //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the cause is the cause of the continuum, which is explained as the substantial cause.

original: rkyen ni lhan cig byed pa'i ming can de dag go //
analyzed: rkyen ni lhan cig byed pa'i ming can de dag go //
translated: The conditions are the cooperating causes.

original: snga ma ni gang thog mar nye bar phrad pa'o //
analyzed: snga ma ni gang thog mar nye bar phrad pa'o //
translated: The preceding cause is the one that first comes into contact with the effect.

original: skad cig ma de dag 'jig pa'i rgyu la mi ltos par rang gi ngang gis ldog pa ni bden pa'i skad cig ma dang por de dag kho na rang gi ngang gis ldog pa dang / 'bras bu skyed par nus pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par can du bskyed do //
analyzed: skad cig ma de dag 'jig pa'i rgyu la mi ltos par rang gi ngang gis ldog pa ni bden pa'i skad cig ma dang por de dag kho na rang gi ngang gis ldog pa dang / 'bras bu skyed par nus pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par can du bskyed do //
translated: By the third moment, they are generated as having the supreme capacity for special potency.

original: skad cig ma gsum pas de dag kyang nus pa khyad par can dang ldan pa'i mchog dang / skad cig ma bzhi pas de dag kyang nus pa'i khyad par ches mchog dang ldan pa de bzhin du mtha' ma'i bar du phul byung ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: skad cig ma gsum pas de dag kyang nus pa khyad par can dang ldan pa'i mchog dang / skad cig ma bzhi pas de dag kyang nus pa'i khyad par ches mchog dang ldan pa de bzhin du mtha' ma'i bar du phul byung ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: By the fourth moment, they are also endowed with the supreme capacity for special potency. In the same way, up to the final moment, they are endowed with excellence.

original: mtha' ma'i rgyu'i tshogs pa las skyes pa de'i phyir 'bras bu skyed pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mtha' ma'i rgyu'i tshogs pa las skyes pa de'i phyir 'bras bu skyed pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Because they are produced from the final collection of causes, they are called the producer of effects.

original: de ltar lhan cig pa rnams kyis ngo bo gzhan thob pa mi thogs par 'bras bu skyed pa 'dir gzhan dag rtsod pa ni lhan cig byed pa las zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de ltar lhan cig pa rnams kyis ngo bo gzhan thob pa mi thogs par 'bras bu skyed pa 'dir gzhan dag rtsod pa ni lhan cig byed pa las zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Thus, the attainment of another nature by the coexistent ones, without obstruction, produces the effect. Here, others argue:

original: lhan cig byed pa'i ngang can gyi rgyu las skyes pa ni gcig gi tshig ni gang dang 'brel pa las byung ba khyad par du bshad ma thag pa'i rnam pas mtha'i tshogs @261b pa'i rgyu'i skad cig ma'i mtshan nyid de las myu gu la sogs pa'i 'bras buüîΩskyed par 'dod pa na /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa'i ngang can gyi rgyu las skyes pa ni gcig gi tshig ni gang dang 'brel pa las byung ba khyad par du bshad ma thag pa'i rnam pas mtha'i tshogs @261b pa'i rgyu'i skad cig ma'i mtshan nyid de las myu gu la sogs pa'i 'bras bu skyed par 'dod pa na /
translated: If you assert that the result, such as a sprout, is generated from that,

original: de nyid kyi khyad par la sogs pa'i 'bras bu 'di skyed pa'i nus pa gang rim gyis 'phel ba'i 'bras bu skyed par 'dod pas de skyed par ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi khyad par la sogs pa'i 'bras bu 'di skyed pa'i nus pa gang rim gyis 'phel ba'i 'bras bu skyed par 'dod pas de skyed par ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then the potency to generate that particular result and so on would gradually increase, but you do not assert that it generates a result.

original: skad cig ma dang po dang nye bar phrad pa rnams brgyud pas khyad par skyed pa'i phyir dang skad cig ma rnams dbye ba med par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig ma dang po dang nye bar phrad pa rnams brgyud pas khyad par skyed pa'i phyir dang skad cig ma rnams dbye ba med par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the particular result is generated by the stream of those that contact the first moment and because it is asserted that the moments are not differentiated.

original: phan tshun khyad par ma thob pa nyid 'bras bu skyed par nus pas khyad par rtsom pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: phan tshun khyad par ma thob pa nyid 'bras bu skyed par nus pas khyad par rtsom pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that those that do not obtain a particular result through mutual contact are capable of generating a result and therefore commence a particular result,üîΩthen that is not so.

original: khyad par ma yin pa las khyad par ma yin dag ces bya ba smos te /üîΩphan tshun 'bras bu skyed pa'i nus pas skyed par 'dod na ni myu gu la sogs pa 'bras bu gang yang khyad par med par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar bsams nas des kyang phan tshun khyad par du skyed pa na lhan cig byed pa la mi ltos par
analyzed: khyad par ma yin pa las khyad par ma yin dag ces bya ba smos te / phan tshun 'bras bu skyed pa'i nus pas skyed par 'dod na ni myu gu la sogs pa 'bras bu gang yang khyad par med par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar bsams nas des kyang phan tshun khyad par du skyed pa na lhan cig byed pa la mi ltos par
translated: In response, he says, ‚ÄúThe nondistinctions are not distinctions.‚ÄùüîΩIf you assert that they generate each other through the power to generate, then any effect, such as a sprout, would not be a distinction.

original: 'bras bu skyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu skyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thinking in this way, if they generate each other as distinctions, they would generate their effect without relying on their co-operators.

original: gal te de ltar gyur na ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar gyur na ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If that were so, what would be established?

original: des zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: des zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúBy that.‚Äù

original: gang gis skad cig ma yang khyad par du skyed pa la mi ltos pa kho nar rang gi 'bras bu gcig byed pa'i mtshan nyid du nges pa ni lhan cig byed pa nyid du bstan to //
analyzed: gang gis skad cig ma yang khyad par du skyed pa la mi ltos pa kho nar rang gi 'bras bu gcig byed pa'i mtshan nyid du nges pa ni lhan cig byed pa nyid du bstan to //
translated: That which is definitely characterized by the production of a single effect without relying on the generation of distinctions is taught to be a co-operator.

original: rgyu des na skad cig ma ma yin pa rnams kyang rgyu nyid du 'gyur la /
analyzed: rgyu des na skad cig ma ma yin pa rnams kyang rgyu nyid du 'gyur la /
translated: By that reason, even nonmomentary things would be causes.

original: ltos par bya ba rnams la ngo bo nyid khyad par du skyed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ltos par bya ba rnams la ngo bo nyid khyad par du skyed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But it does not generate a special nature in the things that are dependent.üîΩThose who, without being shameless or ignorant,üîΩsay that things are not momentary,

original: skad cig ma ma yin par brjod pa rnams skad cig ma la ltos nas rang gi phyogs dang mtshungs par ston pa ni gang dag / ngo tsha med pa'am mi shes pa //üîΩma gtogs de ltar brjod pa gang //
analyzed: skad cig ma ma yin par brjod pa rnams skad cig ma la ltos nas rang gi phyogs dang mtshungs par ston pa ni gang dag / ngo tsha med pa'am mi shes pa // ma gtogs de ltar brjod pa gang //
translated: are like our own group,

original: gang phyir su la mdzes par 'gyur //
analyzed: gang phyir su la mdzes par 'gyur //
translated: but what is the use of them?

original: skad cig rnams la'ang de kun mtshungs //
analyzed: skad cig rnams la'ang de kun mtshungs //
translated: All of that is the same for momentary things.üîΩThese are the causes of distinction,

original: khyad par gyi ni rgyu 'di dag / rnam pa 'gas kyang rkyen du min //
analyzed: khyad par gyi ni rgyu 'di dag / rnam pa 'gas kyang rkyen du min //
translated: but in no way are they conditions.

original: skad cig ma rnams dbyer med na //
analyzed: skad cig ma rnams dbyer med na //
translated: If the moments are not distinct,

original: rtag pa bzhin du sbyor ba min //
analyzed: rtag pa bzhin du sbyor ba min //
translated: they are not connected like permanent things.

original: zhes smra'o // de ltar ni 'gyur na skad cig ma dang po yang zhing sa bon la sogs pa phan tshun 'brel par 'byung ba'i khyad par kho na nye ba las yin te /
analyzed: zhes smra'o // de ltar ni 'gyur na skad cig ma dang po yang zhing sa bon la sogs pa phan tshun 'brel par 'byung ba'i khyad par kho na nye ba las yin te /
translated: If that were so, then the first moment would be the seed, etc., and the special arising of the mutual connection would be due to the mere proximity of the seed, etc.

original: gang dang de ni rtag tu 'brel //
analyzed: gang dang de ni rtag tu 'brel //
translated: That is always connected with it.

original: ring na gnas kyang de dang der //
analyzed: ring na gnas kyang de dang der //
translated: Even if it is far away, it is there.

original: zhes bya ba'i rigs pas yul ring po ni 'dug pa yang rgyu dang 'bras bur 'gyur ro snyam du dogs pa na lhan cig byed pas byas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i rigs pas yul ring po ni 'dug pa yang rgyu dang 'bras bur 'gyur ro snyam du dogs pa na lhan cig byed pas byas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The effect of the assemblage is produced by the assemblage itself.

original: lhan cig byed rnams phan tshun phrad nas ma tshang yang dngos @262a * //üîΩpo'i chos nyid kho nas phan tshun nye bar skyed de /
analyzed: lhan cig byed rnams phan tshun phrad nas ma tshang yang dngos @262a * // po'i chos nyid kho nas phan tshun nye bar skyed de /
